quotes.quote: The league has been criticized for refusing to negotiate contracts; as a result, in several instances, the UFC's most popular fighters had refused to fight, preferring instead to leave the UFC for smaller competing league.
quotes.author: Kenneth E. Clow

quotes.quote: The UFC is to MMA what the National Football League (NFL) is to football.
quotes.author: Anthony Johnson

quotes.quote: Sometimes you'll win, sometimes you'll lose. Whether win or lose, believe in your own value and give always the best of yourself.
quotes.author: King Mo

quotes.quote: Every fighter has one fight that makes or breaks him.
quotes.author: Elia Kazan

quotes.quote: Once you make a mistake in a fight or competition you never do that again.
quotes.author: Renzo Gracie

quotes.quote: A fighter can always recover, and you never know what they're going to come back with.
quotes.author: Holly Holm

quotes.quote: Fighting is the best thing a man can do with his soul.
quotes.author: Renzo Gracie

quotes.quote: Martial Arts will make you a better person if you allow it to. So many people see a low point as bad luck but its a learning experience.
quotes.author: Cub Swanson

quotes.quote: When you're a fighter, and you're not doing good in your work, that happens you lost the fight.
quotes.author: Rafael dos Anjos

quotes.quote: Anytime you lose one fight in the UFC, you kind of have to feel like you are on the chopping block. There is so much competition in this sport.
quotes.author: Charlie Brenneman

quotes.quote: You need a dragon hidden inside you. When you need,you let the dragon out
quotes.author: Anderson Silva

quotes.quote: Be brave, be bold and above all be honest, some people will hate you and some will love you but they will all see the real you.
quotes.author: Renzo Gracie

quotes.quote: Don't limit yourself and don't let anyone put a limit on your potential.
quotes.author: Randa Markos

quotes.quote: In fighting, in evolution, in life, efficiency is the key.
quotes.author: George St-Pierre

quotes.quote: A good fighter usually knows, to within a very few seconds, when a three-minute round is going to end.
quotes.author: Jack Dempsey

quotes.quote: MMA is one of the biggest sports in the world to rival boxing, football, and professional wrestling
quotes.author: M. Laurence

quotes.quote: This sport— mixed martial arts, or MMA— is a hurt business. The real hurt business.
quotes.author: Jon L. Wertheim

quotes.quote: In a short span of time, the UFC has gone from an underground pursuit, kept alive mostly as an Internet-based subculture, to a business that Wall Street values at $500 million.
quotes.author: Jon L. Wertheim

quotes.quote: Today, old-school sports values play a significant role in the appeal of MMA. There's something brutally, outdated democratic about an organized fight.
quotes.author: Jon L. Wertheim

quotes.quote: The purest form of sport is fighting, and the purest form of fighting is mixed martial arts.
quotes.author: Jon L. Wertheim

quotes.quote: When this thing is a sport, all over the entire world, and you can take the UFC to any city in the country, just like soccer then I did it. I did what I set out to do. That's why I was put on this planet. That's my job, my destiny, whatever the expletive you want to call it.
quotes.author: Yahoo Sports

quotes.quote: The sport of Pankration, which combined grappling and striking skills was a great deal like the modern mixed martial arts.
quotes.author: Jeff McCall

quotes.quote: The beauty of MMA is that you don't have to excel at one style of fighting. Well rounded fighters who have good skills in a multitude of styles are usually better fighters than someone who trains in just boxing or karate.
quotes.author: Jeff McCall

quotes.quote: As for the actual fighting, it often assumes the feel of a video game, with its spasms of action and multiple ways of winning and losing.
quotes.author: Jon L. Wertheim

quotes.quote: To understand combat, one must approach it in a very simple and direct manner.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: I always said MMA is a combination of four Olympics sports and while Olympians train solely for one sport, a mixed martial artist has to know them all.
quotes.author: Bas Rutten

quotes.quote: Mixed Martial Arts is the execution of multiple combat sports disciplines with the goal of knocking out, submitting or outscoring an opponent before he does it to you.
quotes.author: BIg John McCarthy

quotes.quote: There are no guarantees in MMA other than that no two fights ever look the same. An experienced champion can get knocked out by an underdog's single punch.
quotes.author: BIg John McCarthy

quotes.quote: The primary objective of MMA is to win by submission, knockout, or a judge's decision based on strikes, cage dominance, and positional dominance.
quotes.author: Loren Landow

quotes.quote: Training like a fighter is more than exercise. It's a form of self expression and a great physical outlet. But getting fit like an MMA fighter benefits beyond looking ripped.
quotes.author: Cat Zingano

quotes.quote: If aliens visit us, the outcome would be much as when Columbus landed in America, which didn't turn out well for the Native Americans.... We only have to look at ourselves to see how intelligent life might develop into something we wouldn't want to meet.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.quote: UFO's' attitude toward the subject is very similar to mine. It's not an advocacy; its philosophy is more â€˜I want to believe this, but I want it proved.
quotes.author: Dwight Schultz

quotes.quote: I believe there's other forms of intelligence in the universe. I've seen and heard some pretty convincing UFO stuff. Besides, if we're the most intelligent things in the universeâ€¦ well, that's just depressing.
quotes.author: Rekha Sharma

quotes.quote: But theÂ UFOÂ phenomenon simply does not behave like extraterrestrial visitors. It actually molds itself in order to fit a given culture.
quotes.author: John Ankerberg

quotes.quote: There is noÂ UFOÂ and also there is no alien, at least not in common mind nor reference.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: TheÂ UFOÂ manifestations seem to be, by and large, merely minor variations of the age-old demonological phenomenon.
quotes.author: John A. Keel

quotes.quote: The energy requirements for interstellar travel are so great that it is inconceivable to me that any creatures piloting their ships across the vast depths of space would do so only in order to play games with us over a period of decades. If they want to make contact, they would make contact; if not, they would save their energy and go elsewhere.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: UFOÂ is a joke when there ain't mystery in the sky.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: The phenomenon ofÂ UFOÂ doesn't say anything about the presence of intelligence in space. It just shows how rare it is here on the earth.
quotes.author: Arthur C. Clarke

quotes.quote: This was no ordinaryÂ UFO. Scores of people saw it. It was no illusion, no deception, no imagination.
quotes.author: Azim Daudpota

quotes.quote: I am discounting reports of UFOs. Why would they appear only to cranks and weirdos?
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.quote: UFO mythology is similar to the message of the classical religions where God sends his Angels as emissaries who offer salvation to those who accept the faith and obey his Prophets. Today, the chariots of the gods are UFOs. What we are witnessing in the past half century is the spawning of a New Age religion.
quotes.author: Paul Kurtz

quotes.quote: Mission Control, please be informed, there is a Santa Claus.
quotes.author: James Lovell

quotes.quote: I can assure you thatÂ flying saucers, given that they exist, are not constructed by any power on Earth.
quotes.author: Harry S. Truman

quotes.quote: UFOs: The reliable cases are uninteresting and in the interesting cases are unreliable.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: Two possibilities exist: Either we are alone in the Universe or we are not. Both are equally terrifying.
quotes.author: Arthur C. Clarke

quotes.quote: There are two types of UFOs -- the ones we build and the ones "they" build.
quotes.author: Ben Rich

quotes.quote:
To my way of thinking, there is every bit as much evidence for the
existence of UFOs as there is for the existence of God. Probably far
more. At least in the case of UFOs there have been countless taped
and filmed and, by the way, unexplained sightings from all over the
world, along with documented radar evidence seen by experienced
military and civilian radar operators.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote:
When people stargazing, they stare at stars,
and many other things which they've already
presumed commonly and universally as stars.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: Regarding alien beings andÂ UFOÂ sightings, They're less about 'where' or 'when' to find, more about 'how' or using 'what' to identify.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: You see a lot of UFOs with closed eyes and opened mind.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: The definitive resolution of the UFO enigma will not come about unless and until the problem is subjected to open and extensive scientific study by the normal procedures of established science and administrators in universities.
quotes.author: Peter A. Sturrock

quotes.quote: Flying saucers are nothing more than miracles, and they occur essentially to bedevil science.
quotes.author: Terence McKenna

quotes.quote: I thought I was so ugly for so long, and I wasted so much of my life on this dumb notion.
quotes.author: Margaret Cho

quotes.quote: Never pick a fight with an ugly person, they've got nothing to lose.
quotes.author: Robin Williams

quotes.quote: Ugly people kill people all the time. But when pretty people did, it got attention.
quotes.author: Chelsea Cain

quotes.quote: Every man is handsome, every woman is beautiful. Hardships make us ugly.
quotes.author: Ofosu Kwarteng

quotes.quote: Beauty is variable, ugliness is constant.
quotes.author: Douglas Horton

quotes.quote: I might be ugly, but my cars are real pretty.
quotes.author: Gucci Mane

quotes.quote: The potential beauty of human life is constantly made ugly by man's ever-recurring song of retaliation.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: An ugly diamond is still worth more than a beautiful pebble.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: Alcohol does not make ugly people attractive. It makes it so you could care less that they're ugly.
quotes.author: Doug Stanhope

quotes.quote: The beautiful has but one type, the ugly has a thousand.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: I just do art because I'm ugly and there's nothing else for me to do.
quotes.author: Andy Warhol

quotes.quote: Never insult those who are Poor or Ugly,They are the reason YOU look rich and good!
quotes.author: Abhishek Tiwari

quotes.quote: People who say you are ugly, may be true, because to them, you look like a monster. People who say you are beautiful, may also be true, because to them, you look like an angel.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: No matter how ugly you are; there is always someone who sees his heaven in your eyes.
quotes.author: M.F. Moonzajer

quotes.quote: The ugly can be beautiful. The pretty, never.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: My body is an ugly masterpiece that lives off the beauty of sound.
quotes.author: Chad Sugg

quotes.quote: I would not have had that happen to you. Discourtesy is unspeakably ugly to me.
quotes.author: Thomas Harris

quotes.quote: She may have a weight problem but you have an ugly problem.
quotes.author: Donna Lynn Hope

quotes.quote: Ugly is a word that should only be used to describe sin and never used to describe people.
quotes.author: Ritu Ghatourey

quotes.quote: He's so ugly he should have to wear an oxygen mask.
quotes.author: Mickey Rivers

quotes.quote: When I was born I was so ugly the doctor slapped my mother.
quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

quotes.quote: In an ugly and unhappy world the richest man can purchase nothing but ugliness and unhappiness.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: The beauty on the inside, will determine the ugly on the outside.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: What ever beauty may be it has for its basis order and for its essence unity Beauty is only skin deep, but ugly goes clean to the bone.
quotes.author: Dorothy Parker

quotes.quote: He used to say the uglier things are the longer they live, and the ugliest things live forever.
quotes.author: Mal Peet

quotes.quote: There is nothing ugly; I never saw an ugly thing in my life; for let the form of an object be what it may,—light, shade, and perspective will always make it beautiful.
quotes.author: John Constable

quotes.quote: Those who find ugly meanings in beautiful things are corrupt without being charming. This is a fault. Those who find beautiful meanings in the beautiful things are the cultivated.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: When you're called a character actress it's because you're too ugly to be called a leading lady.
quotes.author: Kathy Burke

quotes.quote: Don't worry. The ugly duckling always grows into a beautiful swan.
quotes.author: Ruth Segall

quotes.quote: Beauty is only skin deep, but ugly is to the bones. When beauty has gone, ugly lingers on.
quotes.author: A Friend's Mother

quotes.quote: There's something about guitars, they're just so big, you know what I mean? You're just like, 'Ugh!' It just seems so overwhelming. And the ukulele is, like, the opposite of overwhelming.
quotes.author: Zooey Deschanel

quotes.quote: I love the ukulele. It's got a beautiful, melodic tone to it. There's something innocent and romantic, and it's just a grand instrument to play.
quotes.author: Pierce Brosnan

quotes.quote: One thing you might want to learn before you attend the world's largest ukulele lesson is how to say ukulele.
quotes.author: Mary Schmich

quotes.quote: If you kiss Ukulele Lady / While you promise ever to be true / And she sees another Ukulele / Lady fooling round with you
quotes.author: Richard A Whiting

quotes.quote: I didn't realize it was commercialized when I unpacked my cases / Because a genuine Hawaii ukulele cost me thirty guineas
quotes.author: Ray Davies

quotes.quote: There's not much you can do with a ukulele that doesn't sound happy.
quotes.author: Jeff Lynne

quotes.quote: It's hard to be depressed around a ukulele. You just pick it up and you're halfway home.
quotes.author: William H. Macy

quotes.quote: Sometimes when you're writing on a ukulele, you're in a totally new land, rhythmically or melodically.
quotes.author: Tift Merritt

quotes.quote: There's something about the ukulele that just makes you smile. It makes you let your guard down. It brings out the child in all of us.
quotes.author: Jake Shimabukuro

quotes.quote: Playing the ukulele and singing is a fantastic stress reliever. So is cleaning! Scrubbing away at the dirt helps clear my mind as well.
quotes.author: Kandyse Mcclure

quotes.quote: Things like guitars and ukuleles, you should never part with it, because there will probably be good, healthy times spent, just playing and writing.
quotes.author: Eddie Vedder

quotes.quote: Growing up, the ukulele was always a respected instrument. It's a big part of our culture. It wasn't until I started traveling outside of Hawaii that I realized people didn't really consider the ukulele to be a real instrument.
quotes.author: Jake Shimabukuro

quotes.quote: The ukulele totally fits that whole hipster community or whatever you want to call it, but then at the same time it works great in nursing homes where senior citizens get together and play, and then as the traditional Hawaiian instrument with people doing the Hula and strumming the ukulele and singing.
quotes.author: Jake Shimabukuro

quotes.quote: The ukulele is the instrument of peace.
quotes.author: Jake Shimabukuro

quotes.quote: If you pick up a ukulele, it will make you unbelievably happy.
quotes.author: Bette Midler

quotes.quote: If everyone played the ukulele, the world would be a better place.
quotes.author: Jake Shimabukuro

quotes.quote: One thing you might want to learn before you attend the world's largest ukulele lesson is how to say ukulele.
quotes.author: Mary Schmich

quotes.quote: There's no ego when you're a ukulele player.
quotes.author: Jake Shimabukuro

quotes.quote: Far away, far away / Where the balmy breezes blow / Where they sway while they play / Ukuleles sweet and low
quotes.author: Gus Kahn

quotes.quote: This guitar only sings the way I play it / It's a part of me just like another arm / It started out as a little ukulele / When I was just a boy on the farm
quotes.author: John Williamson

quotes.quote: A ukulele lady, a roundalay. Rock, rock roll, Child! / Rock, rock, roll, Plymouth Rock roll over. / For a holiday, with a roundalay.
quotes.author: Brian Wilson

quotes.quote: Try a different melody on your ukulele, / Or you'll soon be sitting there strumming
quotes.author: Jay Livingston

quotes.quote: On his ukulele, daily / He would strum / Beedle um bum / Dancing, prancing
quotes.author: Ken Hnesley

quotes.quote: It's a ukulele Honolulu sunset / Listen to the grass skirts sway / Drinking rum from a pineapple / Out on Honolulu Bay
quotes.author: John Prine

quotes.quote: Strummed ukuleles, / Sung the blues, / Seen all my dreams disappear, / But I'm here.
quotes.author: Stephen Sondheim

quotes.quote: Ukulele strummers / Just doing my daily numbers like a quick pick / Ride the rhythm like lazy drummer, word to baby brother
quotes.author: Daniel Alan Maman

quotes.quote: Looking for the perfect wave / And I play my ukulele / While the sun sets for the day
quotes.author: Dirk G.

quotes.quote: For me to enjoy / With my ukulele on my knee / Do the hula dance forever
quotes.author: Harm Van Sleen

quotes.quote: Oh, how I miss his ukulele / And the way he strums those tunes / 'Cause there's two lonesome people in the whole wide world, / It's me and the man and the moon
quotes.author: Edgar Leslie

quotes.quote: On your ukulele / Swinging in the summer breeze / I could think about it a thousand more, times / I could think about you love the rest of my life
quotes.author: Amy Frances Stroup

quotes.quote: But such a tiny and trivial thing as an umbrella can deprive you of the sight of such a stupendous fact as the sun.
quotes.author: Meher Baba

quotes.quote: Don't let the rain drive you to the wrong shelter; the shade can turn out to be your protector and also your destroyer, and sometimes the rain is the perfect protector from the rain.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: You've to close down your umbrella when you are under a canopy. Drop your pride; give praise to God!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Let a smile be your umbrella, and you'll end up with a face full of rain.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote:
God is like an umbrella of illusion and belief,
In rainy days we use him, in sunny days we forget him.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: Illusions are like umbrellas you no sooner get them than you lose them, and the loss always leaves a little painful wound.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: The success is like an umbrella. It has wires in it called faith. It has no meaning if there is no rain and storm called ebbs and flows of life.
quotes.author: Vikrmn

quotes.quote: Under the big political umbrella, a man is just like a leaf in the ocean, with no control of his destiny and does not have any choice.
quotes.author: Zhang Yimou

quotes.quote: An umbrella with many holes is better than no umbrella!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Umbrellas are so small and sad and easy to forget.
quotes.author: Stephanie Perkins

quotes.quote: An open umbrella is just a closed beautiful sky.
quotes.author: Xavier Forneret

quotes.quote: No relationship is all sunshine, but two people can share one umbrella and survive the storm together.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The umbrella won't stop the rain, but it will help you to get out during rainfall. As well as confidence is not going to guarantee your success, but it will give you the opportunity to achieve it.
quotes.author: Eyden I.

quotes.quote: Rain is nature's art; umbrella is man's art. When you walk with your umbrella in a rainy day, you walk with a super art which is a combination of two different arts!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Going around under an umbrella interferes with one's looking up at the sky.
quotes.author: Jerzy Kosinski

quotes.quote: When two men share an umbrella, both of them get wet.
quotes.author: Michael Isenberg

quotes.quote: Bring a raincoat, definitely or at Least a little umbrella that can fit in your bag, because it always does rain.
quotes.author: Gwyneth Paltrow

quotes.quote: Open your umbrella of creativity when glaring heat of adversity hits you unaware.
quotes.author: Angelica Hopes

quotes.quote: We cannot protect ourselves from trouble, but we can dance through the puddles of life with a rainbow smile, twirling the only umbrella we need the umbrella of God's love.
quotes.author: Barbara Johnson

quotes.quote: The mind is like an umbrella. Its most useful when open.
quotes.author: Walter Gropius

quotes.quote: Umbrella cant stop rain but make us to stand in rain. Confidence may not bring success but it gives power to face any challenge.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Umbrella is comfort, rain is life! You must often leave comfort to touch the life!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: If you do not want it to rain, always carry an umbrella.
quotes.author: Andrzej Majewski

quotes.quote: It's a big enough umbrella, but it's always me that ends up getting wet.
quotes.author: Sting

quotes.quote: Worrying is stupid. it's like walking around with an umbrella waiting for it to rain.
quotes.author: Wiz Khalifa

quotes.quote: Prayer is asking for rain and faith is carrying the umbrella.
quotes.author: Barbara Johnson

quotes.quote: Don't let a man put anything over on you except an umbrella.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: A banker is a fellow who lends you his umbrella when the sun is shining, but wants it back the minute it begins to rain.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: I judge how much a man cares for a woman by the space he allots her under a jointly shared umbrella when raining.
quotes.author: Jimmy Cannon

quotes.quote: Compromise makes a good umbrella, but a poor roof.
quotes.author: James Russell Lowell

quotes.quote: It's better to be alone than to be with someone who never sees your worth.
quotes.author: Nishan Panwar

quotes.quote: The saddest truth that I have come to learn is that I was never your first, nor second, but last resort.
quotes.author: James Merrow

quotes.quote: If they don't appreciate your presence, perhaps you should try giving them your absence.
quotes.author: Tinku Razoria

quotes.quote: If you treat me like no one today, tomorrow you will be no one to me.
quotes.author: Cv Pillay

quotes.quote: I might be difficult today. Not because I choose to. But my goodness was taken for granted.
quotes.author: Alfusainey jallow

quotes.quote: Some won't appreciate you no matter how much you do for them. Release yourself. Go where you're appreciated and understood.
quotes.author: Robert Tew

quotes.quote: Learn how to give your absence to those who don't appreciate your presence, in the end you will make them realize how important your present is.
quotes.author: Kemmy Nola

quotes.quote: A lack of appreciation and respect can be a sad end to many wonderful relationships.
quotes.author: Bernajoy Vaal

quotes.quote: Scientists tend to be unappreciated in the world at large, but you can hardly overstate the importance of the work they do.
quotes.author: Bill Bryson

quotes.quote: You can be the nicest person, try your best to please everyone, but at the end of the day all your efforts still go unappreciated!
quotes.author: Rashida Rowe

quotes.quote: I'm not going to hold onto someone, who wants to be held by someone else.
quotes.author: Lucas Hunter

quotes.quote: Don't give everything to a person that isn't giving you anything.
quotes.author: Sonya Parker

quotes.quote: If you can go days without talking to me, I'm obviously not that important to you.
quotes.author: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.quote: She felt excluded, unappreciated and unloved. Never had been loved.
quotes.author: Suzie Wilde

quotes.quote: Hanging with people who make you feel unappreciated, for the mere sake of appearing to be popular, is the loneliest place to be.
quotes.author: Ellen J. Barrier

quotes.quote: Maybe its true that we don't know what we have until we lose it. But it's also true that we don't know what we are missing until we find it!
quotes.author: Aaron Chan

quotes.quote: Sometimes you'll give your all to someone, and they won't appreciate you. That's life. Just don't become bitter because of it.
quotes.author: Sonya Parker

quotes.quote: I give to you because I want to and not expecting anything back, when you start demanding it and expect it like its owed to you, that's when I turn my back.
quotes.author: Tanya Kanakaole

quotes.quote: The very same person you are taking for granted today, is going to be your only chance of help in future.
quotes.author: Tshepo Koos Maluleke

quotes.quote: Anything acquired without effort, and without cost is generally unappreciated.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: We can't be afraid to dismiss the unappreciative.
quotes.author: Dominic Riccitello

quotes.quote: Even a speck of love should not go unappreciated, because, as Rumi said, love is the water of life.
quotes.author: Elif Safak

quotes.quote: It's simple. Women only nag when they feel unappreciated.
quotes.author: Louis de Bernieres

quotes.quote: Real people are destined to be hated and unappreciated by fools.
quotes.author: Isaiah Harden

quotes.quote: Evil was seductive and easy, and virtue was difficult and unappreciated.
quotes.author: Melissa de la Cruz

quotes.quote: When you let people bring you down, you've successfully made yourself a step upon which they'll climb and stand above you.
quotes.author: Terry Mark

quotes.quote: Never feel empty when the person you like turns you down, because not all people are smart enough to appreciate you.
quotes.author: Kemmy Nola

quotes.quote: Lonely isn't a feeling when you're alone, lonely is a feeling when no one cares.
quotes.author: James Merrow

quotes.quote: Give all your pearls, and the swine will make a pearl necklace, then run off. Don't show all your glory.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: That person you took for granted today could turn out to be the only one person you will need tomorrow.
quotes.author: Kemmy Nola

quotes.quote: Believe the unbelievable and receive the impossible.
quotes.author: Jesse Duplantis

quotes.quote: There is nothing so strange and so unbelievable that it has not been said by one philosopher or another.
quotes.author: Rene Descartes

quotes.quote: All that we don't know is astonishing. Even more astonishing is what passes for knowing.
quotes.author: Philip Roth

quotes.quote: If you believe, then unbelievable things can sometimes be possible.
quotes.author: Tim Tebow

quotes.quote: Belief has nothing to do with facts, especially for the unbelievable facts.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: It is unbelievable the amount of hate the human body can sustain before it begins to break.
quotes.author: Megan McKenna

quotes.quote: Believe the unbelievable, dream the impossible, never take no for an answer.
quotes.author: Tony Fernandes

quotes.quote: It is astonishing how little one feels alone when one loves.
quotes.author: John Bulwer

quotes.quote: A man will do astonishing things for a woman he is ardent about.
quotes.author: Celeste Bradley

quotes.quote: It is astonishing what an effort it seems to be for many people to put their brains definitely and systematically to work.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.quote: It is astonishing with how little wisdom mankind can be governed, when that little wisdom is its own.
quotes.author: William Inge

quotes.quote: It is astonishing what force, purity, and wisdom it requires for a human being to keep clear of falsehoods.
quotes.author: Margaret Fuller

quotes.quote: It always seems impossible until it’s done.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: It's unbelievable the primitive feelings that are aroused by rapid change.
quotes.author: Sheila Ballantyne

quotes.quote: Our minds have unbelievable power over our bodies.
quotes.author: Andre Maurois

quotes.quote: It's truly unbelievable, the tenacity of life.
quotes.author: Henry Winkler

quotes.quote: If we all helped one person, wouldn't the world be an unbelievable place?
quotes.author: Hoda Kotb

quotes.quote: In this unbelievable universe in which we live, there are no absolutes. Even parallel lines, reaching into infinity, meet somewhere yonder.
quotes.author: Pearl S. Buck

quotes.quote: It is astonishing how the human animal survives its misfortunes.
quotes.author: Rebecca West

quotes.quote: It is wonderful how quickly you get used to things, even the most astonishing.
quotes.author: Edith Nesbitt

quotes.quote: To believe a thing impossible is to make it so.
quotes.author: French Proverb

quotes.quote: To the timid and hesitating everything is impossible because it seems so.
quotes.author: Walter Scott

quotes.quote: Because a thing seems difficult for you, do not think it impossible for anyone to accomplish.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: The impossible often has a kind of integrity which the merely improbable lacks.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.quote: The only place where your dream becomes impossible is in your own thinking.
quotes.author: Robert Schuller

quotes.quote: There is only one thing that makes a dream impossible to achieve: the fear of failure.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: There is nothing impossible to him who will try.
quotes.author: Alexander The Great

quotes.quote: Who knows whether the gods will add tomorrow to the present hour?
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: All human things hang on a slender thread, the strongest fall with a sudden crash.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: This I ever held worse that all certitude, To know not what the worst ahead might be.
quotes.author: Algernon Charles Swinburne

quotes.quote: When the mind is in a state of Uncertainty the smallest impulse directs it to either side
quotes.author: Terence

quotes.quote: Maturity of mind is the capacity to endure Uncertainty.
quotes.author: John Finley

quotes.quote: Have you heard that it was good to gain the day? I also say it is good to fall, battles are lost in the same spirit in which they are won.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: If life were predictable it would cease to be life, and be without flavor.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Everything in life is luck.
quotes.author: Donald Trump

quotes.quote: Money takes wings. The only thing that endures is character.
quotes.author: O. J. Simpson

quotes.quote: Doubt, of whatever kind, can be ended by action alone.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: It's not a terrible thing that we feel fear when faced with the unknown. It is part of being alive, something we all share.
quotes.author: Pema Chodron

quotes.quote: Madness is the result not of uncertainty but of certainty.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: The trouble with the world is that the stupid are so confident while the intelligent are full of doubt.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: The beginning of knowledge is the discovery of something we do not understand.
quotes.author: Frank Herbert

quotes.quote: Only do what your heart tells you.
quotes.author: Princess Diana

quotes.quote: For my part I know nothing with any certainty, but the sight of the stars makes me dream.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: Uncertainty is the only certainty there is, and knowing how to live with insecurity is the only security.
quotes.author: John Allen Paulos

quotes.quote: Uncertainty and mystery are energies of life. Don't let them scare you unduly, for they keep boredom at bay and spark creativity.
quotes.author: R. I. Fitzhenry

quotes.quote: The only thing that makes life possible is permanent, intolerable uncertainty; not knowing what comes next.
quotes.author: Ursula K. Leguin

quotes.quote: The quest for certainty blocks the search for meaning. Uncertainty is the very condition to impel man to unfold his powers.
quotes.author: Erich Fromm

quotes.quote: There are years that ask questions and years that answer.
quotes.author: Zora Neale Hurston

quotes.quote: Faith means living with uncertainty - feeling your way through life, letting your heart guide you like a lantern in the dark.
quotes.author: Dan Millman

quotes.quote: One doesn't discover new lands without consenting to lose sight of the shore for a very long time.
quotes.author: Andre Gide

quotes.quote: The quality of your life is in direct proportion to the amount of uncertainty you can comfortably deal with.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Uncertainty and expectation are the joys of life. Security is an insipid thing, though the overtaking and possessing of a wish discovers the folly of the chase.
quotes.author: William Congreve

quotes.quote: The longing for certainty ... is in every human mind. But certainty is generally illusion.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: When one admits that nothing is certain one must, I think, also add that some things are more nearly certain than others.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: If we insist on being as sure as is conceivable... we must be content to creep along the ground, and can never soar.
quotes.author: John Henry Cardinal Newman

quotes.quote: I can live with doubt and uncertainty. I think it's much more interesting to live not knowing than to have answers which might be wrong.
quotes.author: Richard P. Feynman

quotes.quote: The future is uncertain but this uncertainty is at the very heart of human creativity.
quotes.author: Ilya Prigogine

quotes.quote: Each person is a vast territory of undiscovered mystery as nebulous and uncharted as the deepest oceans and expanses of space.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: Life is uncharted territory. It reveals its story one moment at a time.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.quote: Change means traveling in uncharted waters and this causes our securities to rise.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: You have to do things that do good for you and when there's an uncharted course, you have to figure out how to get through it.
quotes.author: Harry Connick Jr.

quotes.quote: You'll never be disappointed if you always keep an eye on uncharted territory, where you'll be challenged and growing and having fun.
quotes.author: Kirstie Alley

quotes.quote: Feelings take you into uncharted territory from time to time it's true, but you almost always benefit from the journey one way or the other. We tend to think of the rational as a higher order, but it is the emotional that marks our lives.
quotes.author: Merle Shain

quotes.quote: Unexplored paths lead to undiscovered treasures.
quotes.author: Constance Chuks Friday

quotes.quote: A life lived unexplored is a life not worth living.
quotes.author: Kirk Hammett

quotes.quote: The invisible is only another unexplored country, a brave new world.
quotes.author: Angela Carter

quotes.quote: The brain is a world consisting of a number of unexplored continents and great stretches of unknown territory.
quotes.author: Santiago Ramon y Cajal

quotes.quote: We have come to see how great is the unexplored.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: No matter how low you go, there's always an unexplored basement.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: Originality is unexplored territory. You get there by carrying a canoe - you can't take a taxi.
quotes.author: Alan Alda

quotes.quote: Let us rejoice at the many unexplored fields in which there is unlimited fame and fortune to the successful explorer.
quotes.author: George Washington Carver

quotes.quote: Myth is the hidden part of every story, the buried part, the region that is still unexplored because there are as yet no words to enable us to get there. Myth is nourished by silence as well as by words.
quotes.author: Italo Calvino

quotes.quote: The oceans are pretty unexplored places and the final frontier on our planet; also because they're the source of life. There are dramatic things happening to them at the moment, and they're worth exploring.
quotes.author: Peter Sarsgaard

quotes.quote: God is not nice. God is not an uncle. God is an earthquake.
quotes.author: Abraham Joshua Heschel

quotes.quote: My wife had an uncle who could never walk down the nave of an abbey without wondering whether it would take spin.
quotes.author: Alec Douglas-Home

quotes.quote: An uncle is there to help a child get into mischief that they haven't thought of yet.
quotes.author: Brett McKay

quotes.quote: As a matter of fact, I am an uncle. I have nine nephews and nieces. I'm not sure if they think I'm all that quick with a quip. But I'm quick with a spank.
quotes.author: Dean Norris

quotes.quote: Dear Nephew, as you will already have realized during our much too brief companionship, I am essentially a man of principle. That is unpleasant and depressing not only to those who come in contact with me, but also to myself as well. Yet it is my principles that have made me what I am, and no one can ask me to deny my fundamental self. Not even you, my dear nephew.
quotes.author: Franz Kafka

quotes.quote: My uncle is a Southern planter. He's an undertaker in Alabama.
quotes.author: Fred Allen

quotes.quote: There was living in the palace at this time a brother of the great Germanicus, and consequently an uncle of the late emperor, whose name was Claudius Caesar.
quotes.author: Frederic William Farrar

quotes.quote: Men always talk about the most important things to perfect strangers. In the perfect stranger we perceive man himself; the image of a God is not disguised by resemblances to an uncle or doubts of wisdom of a mustache.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: It's healthy to say uncle when your bone's about to break.
quotes.author: Jonathan Franzen

quotes.quote: My uncle Sammy was an angry man. He had printed on his tombstone, what are you looking at?
quotes.author: Margaret Smith

quotes.quote: My father was strict and always taught me, no matter who it is, everybody is an uncle. To me, everybody was someone I respect like family. I grew up with that.
quotes.author: Mariano Rivera

quotes.quote: A man with a hump backed uncle mustn't make fun of another man's cross eyed aunt.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: It was my Uncle George who discovered that alcohol was a food well in advance of modern medical thought.
quotes.author: P. G. Wodehouse

quotes.quote: Everyone had an uncle who tried to steal their nose.
quotes.author: Peter Kay

quotes.quote: No family is complete without an embarrassing uncle.
quotes.author: Peter Morgan

quotes.quote: That it's better to retire, in Uncle Earl's terms, when you still have some snap left in your garters.
quotes.author: Russell B. Long

quotes.quote: My uncle's dying wish he wanted me on his lap. He was in the electric chair.
quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

quotes.quote: My uncle used to love me, but she died.
quotes.author: Roger Miller

quotes.quote: An uncle of mine emigrated to Canada and couldn't take his guitar with him. When I found it in the attic, I'd found a friend for life.
quotes.author: Sting

quotes.quote: I will live in thy heart, die in thy lap, and be buried in thine eyes and moreover, I will go with thee to thy uncle’s.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Being an uncle brings me utter joy.
quotes.author: Russell Tovey

quotes.quote: You can tell your uncle stuff that you could not tell your dad. That is kind of the role of an uncle. I feel very much like a father sometimes but sometimes I feel like a teammate.
quotes.author: Dusty Baker

quotes.quote: I think my uncle was probably the biggest influence in my life. We grew up in the same house, and he was just a really great, hard-working, honest, ethical person.
quotes.author: Catherine Bell

quotes.quote: My uncle, gentlemen, could say nothing; he was so very much astonished The queerest thing of all, was, that although there was such a crowd of persons, and although fresh faces were pouring in, every moment, there was no telling where they came from. They seemed to start up, in some strange manner, from the ground, or the air, and disappear in the same way.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: I mean, I'm an uncle of seven or eight, and I don't mind it at all! Kids are great. Kids are the best six-hour experience you can have!
quotes.author: Chris O'Dowd

quotes.quote: If there is any thing disagreeable going on, men are always sure to get out of it.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: We have to be honest about what we want and take risks rather than lie to ourselves and make excuses to stay in our comfort zone.
quotes.author: Ray Bennett

quotes.quote: The unknown makes people uncomfortable.
quotes.author: Holly Hunter

quotes.quote: Sometimes life seems uncomfortable and that's actually when life starts.
quotes.author: M.H. Rakib

quotes.quote: They are uncomfortable talking about sex because they don't want people to think they know about it.
quotes.author: Sue Johanson

quotes.quote: The more you seek the uncomfortable, the more you will become comfortable.
quotes.author: Conor McGregor

quotes.quote: It's a disagreeable thing to be whipped.
quotes.author: William Tecumseh Sherman

quotes.quote: Mere bashfulness without merit is awkwardness.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: No one has the right to make where you go or what you do uncomfortable.
quotes.author: Normani Kordei

quotes.quote: What is allowed us is disagreeable, what is denied us causes us intense desire.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: Change is uncomfortable, but it's helpful!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: We're supposed to be uncomfortable when we read something. That's how we learn.
quotes.author: Judy Blume

quotes.quote: Sometimes being uncomfortable is the only way to save yourself from settling.
quotes.author: Andrea Ager

quotes.quote: Whatever makes you uncomfortable is your biggest opportunity for growth.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: People are uncomfortable about disability, and so interactions can become unintentionally uncomfortable.
quotes.author: Stella Young

quotes.quote: You can disagree without being disagreeable.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Be willing to be uncomfortable. Be comfortable being uncomfortable. It may get tough, but it's a small price to pay for living a dream.
quotes.author: Peter McWilliams

quotes.quote: True success is achieved by stretching oneself, learning to feel comfortable being uncomfortable.
quotes.author: Ken Poirot

quotes.quote: Everyone has an uncomfortable club in their bag.
quotes.author: Jason Day

quotes.quote: Comfort kills ambition. Get uncomfortable and get used to it in your pursuit of your goals and dreams.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: The only time you are actually growing is when you are uncomfortable.
quotes.author: T. Harv Eker

quotes.quote: Uncertainty is an uncomfortable position. But certainty is an absurd one.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: If you want to change you have to be willing to be uncomfortable.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The innocent seldom find an uncomfortable pillow.
quotes.author: William Cowper

quotes.quote: Discomfort brings engagement and change. Discomfort means you're doing something that others were unlikely to do, because they're hiding out in the comfortable zone.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: If you have learned how to disagree without being disagreeable, then you have discovered the secrete of getting along - whether it be business, family relations, or life itself.
quotes.author: Bernard Meltzer

quotes.quote: Get comfortable with being uncomfortable!
quotes.author: Jillian Michaels

quotes.quote: The purpose of making people feel uncomfortable is to play with their preconceptions.
quotes.author: Mike White

quotes.quote: Move out of your comfort zone. You can only grow if you are willing to feel awkward and uncomfortable when you try something new.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: It is uncomfortable to keep your dreams in a house just behind a public toilet; your dreams will surely attract bad odours from the waste products of people in detracting environments. Keep it away from negative people!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: The ultimate lesson all of us have to learn is unconditional love, which includes not only others but ourselves as well.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quotes.quote: Unconditional love is an illogical notion, but such a great and powerful one.
quotes.author: A.J. Jacobs

quotes.quote: The unconditional love of God leads to a life of freedom and transforms each day into a potentially wild adventure.
quotes.author: Randy Elrod

quotes.quote: True unconditional love starts from you to you. Stop waiting on others to give it to you.
quotes.author: Edmond Mbiaka

quotes.quote: Unconditional love is the greatest gift of all.
quotes.author: Sylvia Massara

quotes.quote: The only way love can last a lifetime is if it's unconditional. The truth is this: love is not determined by the one being loved but rather by the one choosing to love
quotes.author: Stephen Kendrick

quotes.quote: Unconditional Love is the outer expression of Inner Peace.
quotes.author: Alaric Hutchinson

quotes.quote: Unconditional love is hard to compete with.
quotes.author: Abbi Glines

quotes.quote: What it's like to be a parent: It's one of the hardest things you'll ever do but in exchange it teaches you the meaning of unconditional love.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: When we make the choice to fill our heart space with unconditional love, our worlds blossom into a beauty far greater than we have known.
quotes.author: Rio Godfrey

quotes.quote: Remember, in our inmost being, we are all completely lovable because spirit is love. Beyond what anyone can make you think or feel about yourself, your unconditioned spirit stands, shining with a love nothing can tarnish.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Love expects no reward. Love knows no fear. Love Divine gives - does not demand. Love thinks no evil; imputes no motive. To Love is to share and serve.
quotes.author: Swami Sivananda

quotes.quote: Love is the only force capable of transforming an enemy into friend.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: Love is when the other person's happiness is more important than your own.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.quote: One is loved because one is loved. No reason is needed for loving.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Love recognizes no barriers. It jumps hurdles, leaps fences, penetrates walls to arrive at its destination full of hope.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Intense love does not measure, it just gives.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Love is the ability and willingness to allow those that you care for to be what they choose for themselves without any insistence that they satisfy you.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Don't do anything by half. If you love someone, love them with all your soul.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.quote: We all want to be in love and find that person who is going to love us no matter how our feet smell, no matter how angry we get one day, no matter the things we say that we don't mean.
quotes.author: Will Smith

quotes.quote: We do not judge the people we love.
quotes.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quotes.quote: You know it's love when all you want is that person to be happy, even if you're not part of their happiness.
quotes.author: Julia Roberts

quotes.quote: Love is all, it gives all, and it takes all.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: My love for you overflows like a stream of waterfall. You may make mistakes and we may fight but I will always love you unconditionally, just as you are.
quotes.author: Tanisha Lakes

quotes.quote: Accepting someone with all their faults and failings without expecting anything in return is hard. But that is what true love is all about.
quotes.author: Allison Maine

quotes.quote: Anyone can love according to their convenience. True love is tested when you have to love someone even when they do not love you back in the same way.
quotes.author: Chloe Truth

quotes.quote: There are people who wish to love more and give more of themselves. They find out that the highest form of love is unconditional.
quotes.author: Audrey James

quotes.quote: The only love worthy of a name is unconditional.
quotes.author: John Powell

quotes.quote: Intense love does not measure it just gives.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Only when we give joyfully, without hesitation or thought of gain, can we truly know what love means.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.quote: In a minute there is time for decisions and revisions which a minute will reverse.
quotes.author: T.S. Eliot

quotes.quote: They are decided only to be undecided, resolved to be irresolute, adamant for drift, solid for fluidity, all-powerful to be impotent.
quotes.author: Sir Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Feeling unsure and lost is part of your path. Don't avoid it. See what those feelings are showing you and use it.
quotes.author: Louis C. K.

quotes.quote: We know what happens to people who stay in the middle of the road. They get run down.
quotes.author: Aneurin Bevan

quotes.quote: The risk of a wrong decision is preferable to the terror of indecision.
quotes.author: Maimonides

quotes.quote: The souls of men of undecided and feeble purpose are the graveyards of good intentions.
quotes.author: John Foster

quotes.quote: Whatever else is unsure in this stinking dunghill of a world a mother's love is not.
quotes.author: James Joyce

quotes.quote: Life is so brief and time is a thief when you're undecided.
quotes.author: Rod Stewart

quotes.quote: You are only earning the life you get when your inaction allows people to decide for you.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: There is no more miserable human being than one in whom nothing is habitual but indecision.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Some problems are so complex that you have to be highly intelligent and well informed just to be undecided about them.
quotes.author: Laurence J. Peter

quotes.quote: Uncertain ways unsafest are, And doubt a greater mischief than despair.
quotes.author: John Denham

quotes.quote: Necessity may render a doubtful act innocent, but it cannot make it praiseworthy.
quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

quotes.quote: Where one is hopelessly undecided as to what to say, there (as Confucius would have said, if they had given him the opportunity) silence is golden.
quotes.author: Lewis Carroll

quotes.quote: All argument is against it; but all belief is for it.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Often undecided whether to desert a sinking ship for one that might not float, he would make up his mind to sit on the wharf for a day.
quotes.author: Max Aitken

quotes.quote: Undecided thoughts' is called the mind. â€˜Decided thoughts' is called the intellect.
quotes.author: Dada Bhagwan

quotes.quote: The man who voyages strange seas must of necessity be a little unsure of himself. It is the man with the flashy air of knowing everything, who is always with it, that we should beware of.
quotes.author: Fred Hoyle

quotes.quote: The imagination of a boy is healthy, and the mature imagination of a man is healthy; but there is a space of life between, in which the soul is in ferment, the character undecided, the way of life uncertain, the ambition thick-sighted: thence proceeds mawkishness.
quotes.author: John Keats

quotes.quote: Glory and curiosity are the scourges of the soul; the last prompts us to thrust our noses into everything, the other forbids us to leave anything doubtful and undecided.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: When who you are and what you are is not decided by any external forces, then you are in dignity.
quotes.author: Jaggi Vasudev

quotes.quote: When confronted with a challenge, the committed heart will search for a solution. The undecided heart searches for an escape.
quotes.author: Andy Andrews

quotes.quote: When a man plays with your heart it is for one of two reasons: He knows he can or he is undecided.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: Indecision and fear can cripple any chances of succeeding and lead to maelstroms of regret that fuel our most fantastic nightmares.
quotes.author: Kilroy J. Oldster

quotes.quote: If we remain undecided nothing will ever change.
quotes.author: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi

quotes.quote: He who hesitates is sometimes saved.
quotes.author: James Thurber

quotes.quote: Your intellect may be confused, but your emotions will never lie to you.
quotes.author: Roger Ebert

quotes.quote: I must have a prodigious quantity of mind; it takes me as much as a week sometimes to make it up.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: All who consult on doubtful matters, should be void of hatred, friendship, anger, and pity.
quotes.author: Sallust

quotes.quote: Progress is a comparative of which we have not settled the superlative.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: The fact of being an underdog changes people in ways that we often fail to appreciate. It opens doors and creates opportunities and enlightens and permits things that might otherwise have seemed unthinkable.
quotes.author: Malcolm Gladwell

quotes.quote: The more people that learn about you, even if you're an underdog, then you can come under fire a lot and the more attention you get and the more threatening or dangerous you appear to people. And the more people try to knock you down.
quotes.author: Gerard Way

quotes.quote: If you're an underdog, mentally disabled, physically disabled, if you don't fit in, if you're not as pretty as the others, you can still be a hero.
quotes.author: Steve Guttenberg

quotes.quote: It's always fun to be the underdog and surprise people. It certainly puts less pressure on you.
quotes.author: Derek Drouin

quotes.quote: The underdog often starts the fight, and occasionally the upper dog deserves to win.
quotes.author: E. W. Howe

quotes.quote: To be honest, it's more fun being the underdog.
quotes.author: Stephen Karam

quotes.quote: Always being an underdog, always being the player or the person nobody really knew, that always kept a chip on my shoulder.
quotes.author: Paul George

quotes.quote: Boxing is made for film - there is corruption, violence, tragedy and the chance that the underdog can catch the champion with one lucky punch.
quotes.author: Asif Kapadia

quotes.quote: The underdog is a person that's at risk, a person that has a lot of big trials you have to overcome. I mean, that was my life.
quotes.author: Chris Harris Jr.

quotes.quote: A man needs to look, not down, but up to standards set so much above his ordinary self as to make him feel that he is himself spiritually the underdog.
quotes.author: Irving Babbitt

quotes.quote: Stand up for the underdog, the 'loser.' Sometimes having the strength to show loving support for unacknowledged others turns the tides of our own lives.
quotes.author: Alexandra Katehakis

quotes.quote: People only rooted for the underdog in movies, not in middle school.
quotes.author: Sean Platt & David Wright

quotes.quote: A winning mindset can transform an underdog into a champion, conqueror, and achiever. You’re a mindset away from winning your battles!
quotes.author: Assegid Habtewold

quotes.quote: With but few exceptions, it is always the underdog who wins through sheer willpower.
quotes.author: Johnny Weissmuller

quotes.quote: Ultimately, we'll help the people we discriminate against if we try to understand more about them; genetics will lead to a world where there is a sympathy for the underdog.
quotes.author: James D. Watson

quotes.quote: The classic epic fantasy is good versus evil, underdog against power.
quotes.author: Laura Anne Gilman

quotes.quote: The outside perception and inside perception of Microsoft are so different. The view of Microsoft inside Microsoft is always kind of an underdog thing.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: Well, fans always root for the underdog.
quotes.author: Maria Sharapova

quotes.quote: The underdog winning is the romantic position.
quotes.author: Malcolm Gladwell

quotes.quote: The story of Airbnb is really the underdog story in many ways.
quotes.author: Joe Gebbia

quotes.quote: There is also a natural and very, very strong empathy with the underdog, with people who have suffered, people who have been pushed around by foreigners in particular, but also by their own people.
quotes.author: Lakhdar Brahimi

quotes.quote: If you're a white person in the wrong neighborhood, you're an underdog.
quotes.author: Robin Thede

quotes.quote: It's the duty of every man to free himself. Never accept to live an underdog's life in god’s world.
quotes.author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

quotes.quote: Never underestimate your own ignorance.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Never underestimate those who you scar.
quotes.author: Lauryn Hill

quotes.quote: Don't underestimate yourself. You are capable of more than you can ever imagine.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: To underestimate oneself is as much an exaggeration of one's powers than the other.
quotes.author: Arthur Conan Doyle

quotes.quote: Don't underestimate the power of a guilty mind. Never underestimate self-shame and self-destruction.
quotes.author: Tim Hawken

quotes.quote: Too often we underestimate the power of a touch, a smile, a kind word, a listening ear, an honest compliment, or the smallest act of caring, all of which have the potential to turn a life around.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.quote: Never underestimate the power of dreams and the influence of the human spirit. We are all the same in this notion: The potential for greatness lives within each of us.
quotes.author: Wilma Rudolph

quotes.quote: Don't underestimate the power of your vision to change the world. Whether that world is your office, your community, an industry or a global movement, you need to have a core belief that what you contribute can fundamentally change the paradigm or way of thinking about problems.
quotes.author: Leroy Hood

quotes.quote: Never underestimate the power of jealousy and the power of envy to destroy. Never underestimate that.
quotes.author: Oliver Stone

quotes.quote: Don't underestimate the value of doing nothing, of just going along, listening to all the thing you can't hear, and not bothering.
quotes.author: A. A. Milne

quotes.quote: It's a great thing to be underestimated because it puts off your rival or enemy - they're not on their full game if they underestimate you.
quotes.author: Joanna Coles

quotes.quote: It is easy to underestimate the demands of an open heart.
quotes.author: Hisham Matar

quotes.quote: Never underestimate the power of the mind to disempower.
quotes.author: John P. Kotter

quotes.quote: Don't underestimate your worth by comparing yourself with others.
quotes.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

quotes.quote: Never underestimate a child's ability to get into more trouble.
quotes.author: Martin Mull

quotes.quote: Never underestimate the power of stupid people in large groups.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: Never underestimate the healing power of silliness and absurdity.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Never underestimate the difficulty of changing false beliefs by facts.
quotes.author: Henry Rosovsky

quotes.quote: Never underestimate the collective strength of your weakest connections.
quotes.author: Ryan Lilly

quotes.quote: It is impossible to underestimate the significance of your today's choices
quotes.author: Gautama Buddha

quotes.quote: Never underestimate a dumb question.
quotes.author: Brandon Boyd

quotes.quote: You can't underestimate the power of fear.
quotes.author: Pat Nixon

quotes.quote: You must never underestimate your opposition.
quotes.author: John Scarlett

quotes.quote: Never underestimate the impact of a small act.
quotes.author: Tory Burch

quotes.quote: Never underestimate the power of human stupidity.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: Never underestimate the power of a single prayer.
quotes.author: Mark Batterson

quotes.quote: One should never underestimate the power of books.
quotes.author: Paul Auster

quotes.quote: Never underestimate a man who overestimates himself.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Do not underestimate the determination of a quiet man.
quotes.author: Iain Duncan Smith

quotes.quote: Don't underestimate the power of being underestimated.
quotes.author: Tim Fargo

quotes.quote: Let no one underestimate the need of pity. We live in a stony universe whose hard, brilliant forces rage fiercely.
quotes.author: Theodore Dreiser

quotes.quote: Once you have mastered time, you will understand how true it is that most people overestimate what they can accomplish in a year - and underestimate what they can achieve in a decade!
quotes.author: Anthony Robbins

quotes.quote: The price tag you put on yourself decides your worth. Underestimating yourself will cost you dearly.
quotes.author: Apoorve Dubey

quotes.quote: On your life, underestimating the proclivities of finches is likely to lead to great internal hemorrhaging.
quotes.author: Charles Darwin

quotes.quote: A warrior of light who trusts too much in his intelligence will end up underestimating the power of his opponent.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Do not underestimate the 'power of underestimation'. They can't stop you, if they don't see you coming.
quotes.author: Izey Victoria Odiase

quotes.quote: Don't let expertise fool you into seeing false boundaries or underestimating those with wild dreams.
quotes.author: Naveen Jain

quotes.quote: More men are ruined by underestimating the value of money than by overestimating it. Let us, then, abandon the affectation of despising money, and frankly own its value.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: Modesty is the lowest of the virtues, and is a real confession of the deficiency it indicates. He who undervalues himself is justly undervalued by others.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: The man who aims at his own aggrandisement underrates everything else.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: The commonest mistake in history is underestimating your opponent; it happens at the poker table all the time.
quotes.author: David Shoup

quotes.quote: A wise, right, and true estimate of one's own powers is necessary to their highest and best use. The general who overestimates his forces leads them to defeat; he who underestimates them does not lead them at all.
quotes.author: Lyman Abbott

quotes.quote: It is part of a poor spirit to undervalue himself and blush.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: No matter how valuable you are and your ideas, fools will certainly play both of you down, so exclude yourselves from the inflammatory environs of fools.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: I think, therefore I am is the statement of an intellectual who underrates toothaches.
quotes.author: Milan Kundera

quotes.quote: A common mistake that people make when trying to design something completely foolproof is to underestimate the ingenuity of complete fools.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.quote: There is no greater danger than underestimating your opponent.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: You may not always have a comfortable life and you will not always be able to solve all of the world's problems at once but don't ever underestimate the importance you can have because history has shown us that courage can be contagious and hope can take on a life of its own.
quotes.author: Michelle Obama

quotes.quote: Do not undervalue the headache. While it is at its sharpest it seems a bad investment; but when relief begins, the unexpired remainder is worth $4 a minute
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: To overestimate the originality of one's thoughts is perhaps a less serious defect than being unaware of their newness. There is a more pronounced lack of sensitivity in underestimating (ourselves and others) than in overestimating.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: He that overvalues himself will undervalue others, and he that undervalues others will oppress them.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: It is impossible to escape the impression that people commonly use false standards of measurement â€” that they seek power, success and wealth for themselves and admire them in others, and that they underestimate what is of true value in life.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: There is no duty we so much underrate as the duty of being happy.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: Enthusiastic partisans of the idea of progress are in danger of failing to recognize... the immense riches accumulated by the human race. By underrating the achievements of the past, they devalue all those which still remain to be accomplished.
quotes.author: Claude Levi-Strauss

quotes.quote: Never underestimate the meanness in people's souls... Even when they're being kind... especially when they're being kind.
quotes.author: Alice Munro

quotes.quote: Age is foolish and forgetful when it underestimates youth.
quotes.author: J. K. Rowling

quotes.quote: Too often we underestimate the power of a touch, a smile, a kind word, a listening ear, an honest compliment, or the smallest act of caring, all of which have the potential to turn a life around.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.quote: It is impossible to underrate human intelligence -- beginning with one's own.
quotes.author: Henry Adams

quotes.quote: Let us not underrate the value of a fact; it will one day flower in a truth. It is astonishing how few facts of importance are added in a century to the natural history of any animal. The natural history of man himself is still being gradually written.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Too many people overvalue what they are not and undervalue what they are.
quotes.author: Malcolm S. Forbes

quotes.quote: Any fool can criticize, condemn, and complain but it takes character and self control to be understanding and forgiving.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: A blind man knows he cannot see, and is glad to be led, though it be by a dog; but he that is blind in his understanding, which is the worst blindness of all, believes he sees as the best, and scorns a guide.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: If one is master of one thing and understands one thing well, one has at the same time, insight into and understanding of many things.
quotes.author: Van Gogh

quotes.quote: Man is always inclined to be intolerant towards the thing, or person, he hasn't taken the time adequately to understand...
quotes.author: Robert R. Brown

quotes.quote: The evil that is in the world almost always comes of ignorance, and good intentions may do as much harm as malevolence if they lack understanding.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Peace cannot be kept by force; it can only be achieved through understanding.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: When we enlarge our view of the world, we deepen our understanding of our own lives.
quotes.author: Yo-Yo Ma

quotes.quote: Understanding, and action proceeding from understanding and guided by it, is one weapon against the world's bombardment...
quotes.author: James Agee

quotes.quote: The universe must not be narrowed down to the limit of our understanding, but our understanding must be stretched and enlarged to take in the image of the universe as it is discovered.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: Everything that irritates us about others can lead us to an understanding of ourselves.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: Everyone hears only what he understands.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Nothing in life is to be feared. It is only to be understood.
quotes.author: Marie Curie

quotes.quote: If we are to live together in peace, we must come to know each other better.
quotes.author: Lyndon Johnson

quotes.quote: Understanding can overcome any situation, however mysterious or insurmountable it may appear to be.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: Whatever you cannot understand, you cannot possess.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: The improvement of understanding is for two ends: first, our own increase of knowledge; secondly, to enable us to deliver that knowledge to others.
quotes.author: John Locke

quotes.quote: The eye sees only what the mind is prepared to comprehend.
quotes.author: Henri Bergson

quotes.quote: To teach is to understand. To learn is wisdom. To learn together is understanding wisdom.
quotes.author: Sid Mendenhall

quotes.quote: Seek first to understand and then to be understood.
quotes.author: Stephen R. Covey

quotes.quote: Man know much more than he understands.
quotes.author: Alfred Adler

quotes.quote: Mystery creates wonder and wonder is the basis of man's desire to understand.
quotes.author: Neil Armstrong

quotes.quote: If you want to understand today, you have to search yesterday.
quotes.author: Pearl Buck

quotes.quote: Anger and intolerance are the enemies of correct understanding.
quotes.author: Mohandas Gandhi

quotes.quote: Any fool can know. The point is to understand.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Everything that happens happens as it should, and if you observe carefully, you will find this to be so.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: The growth of understanding follows an ascending spiral rather than a straight line.
quotes.author: Joanna Field

quotes.quote: The superior person understands rightness; the inferior person understands profit.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: In the end, we conserve only what we love. We will love only what we understand. We will understand only what we are taught.
quotes.author: Baba Dioum

quotes.quote: Before we can forgive one another, we have to understand one another.
quotes.author: Emma Goldman

quotes.quote: Often the hands grasp more quickly than the head.
quotes.author: Hans Jean Arp

quotes.quote: Underwear was the last fashion frontier - an area designers hadn't exploited yet.
quotes.author: Lauren Goodman

quotes.quote: Underwear shouldn't hurt. If it hurts, you gotta change.
quotes.author: Ronny Chieng

quotes.quote: Underwear is everything because we all know that if we have on the wrong pair of underwear it ruins your day.
quotes.author: Veronica Webb

quotes.quote: Always wear pretty underwear, on account of you just never know.
quotes.author: Jill Browne

quotes.quote: I like to wear my underwear because I like to make a statement about who I am.
quotes.author: Anthony T.Hincks

quotes.quote: When I lost my weight, I went and bought about 15 different types of underwear to see what would look good on my new body. It's exciting!
quotes.author: Richard Simmons

quotes.quote: Don't judge. I used to buy underwear because I didn't do my laundry.
quotes.author: Michelle Obama

quotes.quote: Half the world does not know the joys of wearing cotton underwear.
quotes.author: Phil Gramm

quotes.quote: You can tell a lot about a person from his underwear.
quotes.author: Rachel Bilson

quotes.quote: She asked me what type of contraceptive I use. Underwear. Keeping it on prevents pregnancy.
quotes.author: Melina Marchetta

quotes.quote: Men want the same thing from their underwear that they want from women: a little bit of support, and a little bit of freedom.
quotes.author: Jerry Seinfeld

quotes.quote: All that running around in my underwear put money in my pockets. I can focus on working in interesting movies without having to worry about supporting myself.
quotes.author: Mark Wahlberg

quotes.quote: There was no dignified way to answer a question about your underwear.
quotes.author: Tom Perotta

quotes.quote: Passwords are like underwear: you don’t let people see it, you should change it very often, and you shouldn’t share it with strangers.
quotes.author: Chris Pirillo

quotes.quote: I don't believe in the after life, although I am bringing a change of underwear.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: Governments are like underwear. They start smelling pretty bad if you don't change them once in a while.
quotes.author: Margaret Murray

quotes.quote: The entrance to the Underworld is in Los Angeles.
quotes.author: Rick Riordan

quotes.quote: Hell is the highest reward that the devil can offer you for being a servant of his.
quotes.author: Billy Sunday

quotes.quote: The road toÂ hellÂ is paved with good intentions.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: HellÂ is the place where one has ceased to hope.
quotes.author: A.J. Cronin

quotes.quote: Hell is God's great compliment to the reality of human freedom and the dignity of human choice.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: HellÂ is having no option but the wrong one.
quotes.author: Koushun Takami

quotes.quote: HellÂ was made for the inquisitive.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.quote: HellÂ is full of the talented, but Heaven of the energetic.
quotes.author: Jane Frances de Chantal

quotes.quote: The whole extent of hell, the present suffering, the bitter recollection of the past, the hopeless prospect of the future, will never be thoroughly known except by those who go there.
quotes.author: J. C. Ryle

quotes.quote: HellÂ has three gates: lust, anger, and greed.
quotes.author: Bhagavad Gita

quotes.quote: The gateway to theÂ underworldÂ is seen as part antiquity and part theatre. Welcome to the lower depths.
quotes.author: Peter Ackroyd

quotes.quote: HellÂ is full of musical amateurs.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: No one should brave theÂ underworldÂ alone.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: If there were no hell, the loss of heaven would be hell.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: HellÂ lies at the bottom of the human heart.
quotes.author: Ross MacDonald

quotes.quote: The road toÂ hellÂ is paved with works-in-progress.
quotes.author: Philip Roth

quotes.quote: Hell is truth seen too late - duty neglected in its season.
quotes.author: Tryon Edwards

quotes.quote: Hell is nothing else but nature departed or excluded from the beam of divine light.
quotes.author: William Law

quotes.quote: HellÂ trembles at a heaven-directed eye.
quotes.author: Thomas Ken

quotes.quote: HellÂ hath no fury like a woman scorned.
quotes.author: William Congreve

quotes.quote: The fear ofÂ HellÂ is a very powerful motivation.
quotes.author: Richard Dawkins

quotes.quote: The road toÂ HellÂ is paved with unbought stuffed dogs.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: There is noÂ hell, no inferno except the frenzy of living.
quotes.author: Henri Barbusse

quotes.quote: It takes all sorts of people to make theÂ underworld.
quotes.author: Don Marquis

quotes.quote: TheÂ UnderworldÂ had no mercy. It only had justice.
quotes.author: Rick Riordan

quotes.quote: In theÂ underworld, reality itself has elastic properties and is capable of being stretched into different definitionsof the truth.
quotes.author: Roderick Vincent

quotes.quote: HellÂ is not punishment, it's training.
quotes.author: Shunryu Suzuki

quotes.quote: In the very depths of Hell, do not demons love one another?
quotes.author: Anne Rice

quotes.quote: HellÂ is not in torture;Â HellÂ is in an empty heart..
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: HellÂ is paved with good samaritans.
quotes.author: William M. Holden

quotes.quote: To the uneducated, an A is just three sticks.
quotes.author: A. A. Milne

quotes.quote: Yes, God uses the uneducated to confound the wise. But that doesn't make ignorance a virtue.
quotes.author: Andy Stanley

quotes.quote: It is simplicity that makes the uneducated more effective than the educated when addressing popular audiences.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: The educated differ from the uneducated as much as the living from the dead.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: The life of an uneducated man is as useless as the tail of a dog which neither covers its rear end, nor protects it from the bites of insects.
quotes.author: Chanakya

quotes.quote: A virgin can conceive. A dead body can walk again. Your leprosy can be cured. The blind can see. Nonsense. It’s not moral to lie to children. It’s not moral to lie to ignorant, uneducated people and tell them that if they only would believe nonsense, they can be saved. It’s immoral.
quotes.author: Christopher Hitchens

quotes.quote: Whether we are rich or poor, educated or uneducated, whatever our nationality, colour, social status or ideology may be, the purpose of our lives is to be happy.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Getting an education might be difficult, but it makes life easy. Being uneducated might be easy, but it makes life difficult.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: Democracy is good, but it is not good for an uneducated dogmatic society. Often, that society does not know how to choose wisely.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: It is the part of an uneducated person to blame others where he himself fares ill; to blame himself is the part of one whose education has begun; to blame neither another nor his own self is the part of one whose education is already complete.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: The foolish and the uneducated have little use for freedom. Only the educated are free.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: Uneducated people are unfortunate in that they do grasp complex issues, educated people, on the other hand, often do not understand simplicity, which is a far greater misfortune.
quotes.author: Franz Grillparzer

quotes.quote: The uneducated person perceives only the individual phenomenon, the partly educated person the rule, and the educated person the exception.
quotes.author: Franz Grillparzer

quotes.quote: To change an opinion without a mental process is the mark of the uneducated.
quotes.author: Geoffrey Madan

quotes.quote: A child educated only at school is an uneducated child.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: Democracy means government by the uneducated, while aristocracy means government by the badly educated.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: An uneducated population may be degraded; a population educated, but not in righteousness, will be ungovernable. The one may be slaves, the other must be tyrants.
quotes.author: Henry Melvill

quotes.quote: It is always a much easier task to educate uneducated people than to re-educate the mis-educated.
quotes.author: Herbert M. Shelton

quotes.quote: Imagination is a very potent thing, and in the uneducated often usurps the place of genuine experience.
quotes.author: H. P. Lovecraft
