quotes.quote: I feel like modern country is deliberately dumbing down the human race. They're deliberately making people take glory in being uneducated and racist, and it's just sad. I think it's absolute mind control.
quotes.author: Jim James

quotes.quote: I hate the uneducated and the ignorant. I hate the pompous and the phoney. I hate the jealous and the resentful. I hate the crabbed and mean and the petty. I hate all ordinary dull little people who aren't ashamed of being dull and little.
quotes.author: John Fowles

quotes.quote: Every uneducated person is a caricature of himself.
quotes.author: Karl Wilhelm Friedrich Schlegel

quotes.quote: Why is it that the uneducated minds always criticize the brilliant minds?
quotes.author: Kelly Nelson

quotes.quote: To the uneducated eye, as to the incurious mind, much of the world is in darkness, and a thousand songs are lost on the unlistening ear.
quotes.author: Margaret Millar

quotes.quote: If Jesus didn't rise from the dead, an even greater miracle happened: 12 relatively uneducated guys changed the world and were martyred to protect a lie.
quotes.author: Mark Hart

quotes.quote: I assure you, an educated fool is more foolish than an uneducated one.
quotes.author: Moliere

quotes.quote: The man who graduates today and stops learning tomorrow is uneducated the day after.
quotes.author: Newton D. Baker

quotes.quote: It is among uneducated women that we may look for the most confirmed gossips. Goethe tells us there is nothing more frightful than bustling ignorance.
quotes.author: Nicolas Chamfort

quotes.quote: Those people who think only of themselves, are hopelessly uneducated. They are not educated, no matter how instructed they may be.
quotes.author: Nicholas Murray Butler

quotes.quote: By giving us the opinions of the uneducated, journalism keeps us in touch with the ignorance of the community.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Unemployment is capitalism's way of getting you to plant a garden.
quotes.author: Orson Scott Card

quotes.quote: Unemployment insurance is a pre-paid vacation for freeloaders.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: Unemployment is a great tragedy. The man who goes about hopelessly seeking work in order to earn bread for his children is a living reproach to civilization.
quotes.author: Carlos Saavedra Lamas

quotes.quote: Of all aspects of social misery nothing is so heartbreaking as unemployment.
quotes.author: Jane Addams

quotes.quote: The longer our graduation lines are today, the shorter our unemployment lines will be tomorrow.
quotes.author: George H. W. Bush

quotes.quote: Unemployment diminishes people. Leisure enlarges them.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: If heaven really exists: then heaven is the job, hell is unemployment, while life is merely an interview.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: The cool thing about unemployment is every day is Saturday.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

quotes.quote: Employment frees man from the nightmare of unemployment, while it chains him to his employer’s dream.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: Unemployment or the loss of income which will always affect some in any society is certainly less degrading if it is the result of misfortune and not deliberately imposed by authority.
quotes.author: F.A. Hayek

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as an acceptable level of unemployment, because hunger is not acceptable, poverty is not acceptable, poor health is not acceptable, and a ruined life is not acceptable.
quotes.author: Hubert H. Humphrey

quotes.quote: Inflation is the parent of unemployment and the unseen robber of those who have saved.
quotes.author: Margaret Thatcher

quotes.quote: Unemployment is like a headache or a high temperature – unpleasant and exhausting but not carrying in itself any explanation of its cause.
quotes.author: William Beveridge

quotes.quote: Hunger is not the worst feature of unemployment; idleness is.
quotes.author: William E. Barrett

quotes.quote: Unemployment, with its injustice for the man who seeks and thirsts for employment, who begs for labour and cannot get it, and who is punished for failure he is not responsible for by the starvation of his children – that torture is something that private enterprise ought to remedy for its own sake.
quotes.author: David Lloyd George

quotes.quote: Unemployment is not the situation to blame your fate or on others… It’s time to believe in yourself and Unveil-New-Employment
quotes.author: Shashank Rayal

quotes.quote: Computers can solve all kinds of problems except the unemployment problem they create
quotes.author: Laurence J. Peter

quotes.quote: Unemployment is bigger than a political party. It is a national danger and a national scandal.
quotes.author: Ellen Wilkinson

quotes.quote: As long as there is unemployment, war, crime and all things that go to the infliction of man's inhumanity to man, regardless - there is much to be done, and people need to work together.
quotes.author: Rosa Parks

quotes.quote: The trouble with unemployment is that the minute you wake up in the morning, you're on the job.
quotes.author: Slappy White

quotes.quote: When more and more people are thrown out of work, unemployment results.
quotes.author: Calvin Coolidge

quotes.quote: Long-term unemployment can make any worker progressively less employable, even after the economy strengthens.
quotes.author: Janet Yellen

quotes.quote: We need to give importance to skill development because this way we can end unemployment.
quotes.author: Narendra Modi

quotes.quote: The final solution for unemployment is work.
quotes.author: Calvin Coolidge

quotes.quote: Unfortunately, very few governments think about youth unemployment when they are drawing up their national plans.
quotes.author: Kofi Annan

quotes.quote: Everyone has the right to work, to free choice of employment, to just and favorable conditions of work and to protection against unemployment.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Sometimes people are afraid of falling in love, because it sometimes comes in a way we never expected.
quotes.author: Terry Mark

quotes.quote: Art, like love, moves the heart in unexpected directions.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: You never fall in love by yourself, love captures you. Love comes to you when you don't need it really, and it comes to an end when you need it the most.
quotes.author: Farah Mustafa

quotes.quote: The beauty of love is that, you can fall into it with the most unexpected person at the most unexpected time.
quotes.author: Ritu Ghatourey

quotes.quote: Love can be found in unexpected places. Sometimes we go out searching for what we think we want and we end up with what we're supposed to have.
quotes.author: Kate McGahan

quotes.quote: Love is the flower of life, and blossoms unexpectedly and without law, and must be plucked where it is found, and enjoyed for the brief hour of its duration.
quotes.author: D.H. Lawrence

quotes.quote: The thing about love was that it caught you unawares, turned up in the most unexpected places, even when you weren't looking for it.
quotes.author: Sarra Manning

quotes.quote: Most people want to be circled by safety, not by the unexpected. The unexpected can take you out. But the unexpected can also take you over and change your life. Put a heart in your body where a stone used to be.
quotes.author: Ron Hall

quotes.quote: She wasnt exactly sure when it happened. Or even when it started. All she knew for sure was that right here and now, she was falling hard and she could only pray that he was feeling the same way.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: Love comes to you just at the right time; the time you never thought it would have.
quotes.author: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.quote: The process of love sometimes means unexpected detours.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Alraune

quotes.quote: Its amazing how you can fall in love with a person you didn't even notice the first time you met them.
quotes.author: Crystal Sawyer

quotes.quote: Sometimes the most beautiful thing is precisely the one that comes unexpectedly and unearned, hence something given truly as a present.
quotes.author: Anna Freud

quotes.quote: I have given up the quest for love. Because hopefully love will find me one day. Totally unexpected, astonishing and breathtaking.
quotes.author: NMC

quotes.quote: When all is said and done, the weather and love are the two elements about which one can never be sure.
quotes.author: Alice Hoffman

quotes.quote: The best love story is when you fall in love with most unexpected person at the most unexpected time.
quotes.author: Alfiya Shaliheen

quotes.quote: Unrequited affection is very painful for the lover, but it can have unexpected, creative consequences.
quotes.author: Damon Galgut

quotes.quote: To fall in love you have to be in the state of mind for it to take, like a disease.
quotes.author: Nancy Mitford

quotes.quote: Love was destined and would strike as true as unexpected lightning on a clear day or never come at all.
quotes.author: Dean Francis Alfar

quotes.quote: Every true love and friendship is a story of unexpected transformation. If we are the same person before and after we loved, that means we haven't loved enough.
quotes.author: Elif Shafak

quotes.quote: Love is a very powerful emotion and when a break-up is unexpected, it's very hard to get over.
quotes.author: Leona Lewis

quotes.quote: Never expected to meet you. When I met you I never expected you to become my everything and more than I could have ever dreamed of.
quotes.author: Maria Ana Bulquerin

quotes.quote: Love comes from the most unexpected places.
quotes.author: Barbra Streisand

quotes.quote: It was an unexpected love story between the two.
quotes.author: Marleah Stout

quotes.quote: The best relationships usually begin unexpectedly.
quotes.author: Jelly Wong

quotes.quote: I fell in love with the most unexpected person on the most unexpected time.
quotes.author: Margott

quotes.quote: I never knew what love was until you came into my life without any hint, so unexpected.
quotes.author: Maria Bastida

quotes.quote: Who would have known that you would be the one for me when we did not even like each other in the first place?
quotes.author: Maria Bastida

quotes.quote: Sometimes, love comes in the least expected place, in the least expected ways.
quotes.author: Maria Bastida

quotes.quote: Someday, I know that the right person for me will walk my way and tell me, I love you.
quotes.author: Maria Bastida

quotes.quote: He never made the ten-most-wanted list. It's very unfair voting. It's who you know.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: All that is unfair, offends us if it's not beneficial for us.
quotes.author: Luc De Clapiers

quotes.quote: It is unfair to believe everything we hear about lawyers, some of it might not be true.
quotes.author: Gerald F. Lieberman

quotes.quote: Sometimes, life is unfair, and you have to suck it up and move on and not use it as an excuse.
quotes.author: Robert Kraft

quotes.quote: You will never win an unfair competition since the reward is meaningless.
quotes.author: Cass van Krah

quotes.quote: Try to learn to let what is unfair teach you.
quotes.author: David Foster Wallace

quotes.quote: It's probably unfair to expect the world at large, or even most people, to see us for all we are. It is essential, however, that we see ourselves for all we are.
quotes.author: Victoria Moran

quotes.quote: It's unfair to be fair,For life is unfair.
quotes.author: Farley Maglaya

quotes.quote: There is always inequality in life. Some men are killed in a war and some men are wounded and some men never leave the country. Life is unfair.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: When life is sweet, say thank you and celebrate. And when life is bitter, say thank you and grow.
quotes.author: Shauna Niequist

quotes.quote: It's unfair of a circle to accuse the angle of being sharp.
quotes.author: Multatuli

quotes.quote: It's unfair to think that we can do what we do with the intensity that we do it and expect injuries to not happen.
quotes.author: Daniel Cormier

quotes.quote: Life can be unfair sometimes, but that's no reason to give up on it.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: It is the fairness of life that makes it seem unfair.
quotes.author: Gugu Mona

quotes.quote: Unfair and unkind behavior in exchange for your loving efforts is the rule rather than the exception.
quotes.author: Paul Hauck

quotes.quote: I know the world isn't fair, but why isn't it ever unfair in my favor?
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.quote: If our view is limited to mortal life, some things become unbearable because they seem so unfair and so permanent.
quotes.author: Boyd K. Packer

quotes.quote: If our view is limited to mortal life, some things become unbearable because they seem so unfair and so permanent.
quotes.author: Boyd K. Packer

quotes.quote: Life is savagely unfair. It ignores our deep-seated convictions and places a disproportionate emphasis on the decisions we make in split seconds.
quotes.author: Chris Cleave

quotes.quote: Never be a spectator of unfairness or stupidity. Seek out argument and disputation for their own sake the grave will supply plenty of time for silence.
quotes.author: Christopher Hitchens

quotes.quote: Employers who violate rules of fairness are punished by reduced productivity, and merchants who follow unfair pricing policies can expect to lose sales.
quotes.author: Daniel Kahneman

quotes.quote: Creativity is one of the last remaining legal ways of gaining an unfair advantage over the competition.
quotes.author: Ed McCabe

quotes.quote: Every time you lose, you think that life's unfair. You think of the bad breaks. But when you're winning and playing well, you still get those bad breaks, only you overcome them. It just depends on how strong your mind is.
quotes.author: Greg Norman

quotes.quote: It is very unfair to judge any body's conduct, without an intimate knowledge of their situation.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: Make up your mind that no matter what comes your way, no matter how difficult, no matter how unfair, you will do more than simply survive. You will thrive in spite of it.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: There’s a difference between the fact that the universe is inherently unfair on a cosmic level, and the fact that life is unfair because people are actively making it so.
quotes.author: John Scalzi

quotes.quote: Life is hard. It’s cruel sometimes. It’s merciless and unfair, but we all go through difficult times, one way or another. You’ve had more than your share of knocks lately, I’ll give you that, but it doesn’t mean you get to quit. No one gets to quit. You keep fighting, every day, and sooner or later, the grief fades a little. You grow stronger, find joy again, and everything gets easier. You come out of it more equipped to handle the next wave, which will come eventually. There will always be waves.
quotes.author: Julianne MacLean

quotes.quote: I wanted to show the real side of me because of the unfair things that people said about me, but I realized that it was impossible and tried to think of why people thought of me in that manner.
quotes.author: Kim Jong-hyun

quotes.quote: Greatness is best measured by how well an individual responds to the happenings in life that appear to be totally unfair, unreasonable, and undeserved.
quotes.author: Marvin J. Ashton

quotes.quote: It seems totally unfair that the way we look matters so much. I mean, why can't we just get over this gotta-be-thin-and-beautiful thing? Why can't we just accept ourselves and others for what we are?
quotes.author: Melody Carlson

quotes.quote: The unimaginable always becomes the unforgettable.
quotes.author: Geoffrey Beene

quotes.quote: When the past is forgotten, the present is unforgettable.
quotes.author: Martin Amis

quotes.quote: Some memories are unforgettable, remaining ever vivid and heartwarming!
quotes.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quotes.quote: Poetry is the power of defining the indefinable in terms of the unforgettable.
quotes.author: Louis Untermeyer

quotes.quote: Let excellence be your brand... When you are excellent, you become unforgettable.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Being different and thinking different makes a person unforgettable. History does not remember the forgettable. It honors the unique minority the majority cannot forget.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: Only powerfully conceived images have the ability to penetrate the memory, to stay there, in short to become unforgettable.
quotes.author: Brassai

quotes.quote: Parties are supposed to be unforgettable. No one looks back on their life and remembers the nights they got plenty of sleep.
quotes.author: Ryan Brü

quotes.quote: It's one of those unforgettable moments that happen as a child, when you discover that all along the world has been betraying you.
quotes.author: Nicole Krauss

quotes.quote: Unspoken feelings are unforgettable.
quotes.author: Andrei Tarkovsky

quotes.quote: We've got to make the small things unforgettable.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Two things make the women unforgettable, their tears and their perfume.
quotes.author: Sacha Guitry

quotes.quote: For me the criterion of a good photograph is that it is unforgettable.
quotes.author: Brassai

quotes.quote: All photographs aspire to the condition of being memorable - that is, unforgettable.
quotes.author: Susan Sontag

quotes.quote: Greatness is a journey that begins with the impossible and turns in to the unforgettable.
quotes.author: Miguel Torres

quotes.quote: You care, you dare and you share; this is the unforgettable rule of every true believer and achiever.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: This is how memories are; what seems so clear and unforgettable at one moment vanishes like steam the next.
quotes.author: Michelle Moran

quotes.quote: We have lived through some unforgettable times together, some good, some bad, achieving results that will be hard to equal.
quotes.author: Luca Cordero di Montezemolo

quotes.quote: The value of things is not the time they last, but the intensity with which they occur. That is why there are unforgettable moments and unique people!
quotes.author: Fernando Pessoa

quotes.quote: Technology should be used to create unforgettable experiences that enhance our natural and built environments, transforming them in newly meaningful ways.
quotes.author: David Rockwell

quotes.quote: Learn to forgive fully and completely. If you want health, wealth, and happiness, you can't afford the luxury of lugging around all those unforgiven, unforgotten past events. Let them go.
quotes.author: Peter McWilliams

quotes.quote: The infliction of cruelty with a good conscience is a delight to moralists. That is why they invented Hell.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: A bridge of silver wings stretches from the dead ashes of an unforgiving nightmare to the jeweled vision of a life started anew.
quotes.author: Aberjhani

quotes.quote: How ruthless and vile and hard and right the young are.
quotes.author: Hal Porter

quotes.quote: We must be ruthless with ideas, but gentle with people.
quotes.author: Robert Sirico

quotes.quote: An unforgiving eye, and a damned disinheriting countenance!
quotes.author: Richard Brinsley Sheridan

quotes.quote: Cruelty would be delicious if one could only find some sort of cruelty that didn't really hurt.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Whether fighting or spitting, my discipline is unforgiving!
quotes.author: John Cena

quotes.quote: In a cruel land, you either learned to laugh at cruelty or spent your life weeping.
quotes.author: Robert Jordan

quotes.quote: When the cruel fall into the hands of the cruel, we read their fate with horror, not with pity.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: The most ruthless of all humans are the ones cornered in by death.
quotes.author: Yuu Watase

quotes.quote: Some things are not forgiveable. Deliberate cruelty is not forgiveable. It is the most unforgiveable thing in my opinion, and the one thing in which I have never, ever been guilty.
quotes.author: Tennessee Williams

quotes.quote: I was tough. I used everything to my advantage. I could be very ruthless.
quotes.author: Leon Uris

quotes.quote: Nature is cold, wet, hard and unforgiving.
quotes.author: David Remnick

quotes.quote: Probably human cruelty is fixed and eternal. Only styles change.
quotes.author: Martin Amis

quotes.quote: Cruelty towards others is always also cruelty towards ourselves.
quotes.author: Paul Tillich

quotes.quote: Unforgiveness is spiritual filthiness, so get washed in the water of God's Word to forgive and stay clean.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: Deliberate cruelty is unforgivable.
quotes.author: Blanche Dubois

quotes.quote: Competition-ruthless, unforgiving, to-the-death competition-is a crucial feature of capitalism.
quotes.author: Jim Stanford

quotes.quote: It's best to be ruthless with the past
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: Ruthless striving, overcomes everything.
quotes.author: Petrarch

quotes.quote: Cruelty ever proceeds from a vile mind, and often from a cowardly heart.
quotes.author: Lodovico Ariosto

quotes.quote: Cruelty is the first attribute of the devil.
quotes.author: Lodovico Ariosto

quotes.quote: And his unkindness may defeat my life, But never taint my love.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: This is a ruthless world and one must be ruthless to cope with it.
quotes.author: Charlie Chaplin

quotes.quote: The only unforgivable sin: Being unforgiving.
quotes.author: Malcolm Forbes

quotes.quote: A ruthless man extends his ruthlessness from those he does not love to those he loves.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: This is the pain-pleasure of having newly adult children; they're innocent and ruthless in forgetting their sweet old dependence.
quotes.author: Ian McEwan

quotes.quote: To withhold forgiveness is to take poison and expect the unforgiven to die.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.quote: The unforgivable crime is soft hitting. Do not hit at all if it can be avoided; but never hit softly
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Ungrateful people breed negativity. No one gets any pleasure from giving to an ungrateful person. When you show appreciation, the object of your attention blossoms and flourishes.
quotes.author: Paul McCabe

quotes.quote: He that forgets his friend is ungrateful to him; but he that forgets his Savior is unmerciful to himself.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.quote: The man who is ungrateful is often less to blame than his benefactor.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Ingratitude is always a kind of weakness. I have never known men of ability to be ungrateful.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: An ungrateful man is like a hog under a tree eating acorns, but never looking up to see where they come from.
quotes.author: Timothy Dexter

quotes.quote: Ungratefulness is worse than a cancer; it eats away at your soul; blinding your heart and eyes to the beauty and miracles that are all around us each day in our lives.
quotes.author: Geraldine Vermaak

quotes.quote: He that's ungrateful has no guilt but one; All other crimes may pass for virtues in him.
quotes.author: Edward Young

quotes.quote: He that calls a man ungrateful sums up all the veil that a man can be guilty of.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: But feelings can't be ignored, no matter how unjust or ungrateful they seem.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.quote: A man may be ungrateful, but the human race is not so.
quotes.author: John Milton

quotes.quote: A grateful person is rich in contentment. An ungrateful person suffers in the poverty of endless discontentment.
quotes.author: David A. Bednar

quotes.quote: Every time I appoint someone to a vacant position, I make a hundred unhappy and one ungrateful.
quotes.author: Louis XIV

quotes.quote: One ungrateful person does an injury to all needy people.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: A complaining tongue reveals an ungrateful heart.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: To be ungrateful is to be unnatural. The head may be thus guilty, not the heart.
quotes.author: Antoine Rivarol

quotes.quote: There is no greater difference between men than between grateful and ungrateful people.
quotes.author: R.H. Blyth

quotes.quote: I believe the best definition of man is the ungrateful biped.
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky

quotes.quote: The children of the revolution are always ungrateful, and the revolution must be grateful that it is so.
quotes.author: Ursula K. Le Guin

quotes.quote: A grateful dog is better than an ungrateful man.
quotes.author: Saadi

quotes.quote: Never let ungrateful remarks prevent you from doing what you feel is right and good. Let God be your judge.
quotes.author: Terry Mark

quotes.quote: You'll never see a happy ungrateful person.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: The wicked are always ungrateful.
quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes

quotes.quote: Some natures are so sour and ungrateful that they are never to be obliged.
quotes.author: Roger L'Estrange

quotes.quote: The saddest of all hearts is one without gratitude.
quotes.author: Tom Krause

quotes.quote: Sadness is so ungrateful.
quotes.author: Han Suyin

quotes.quote: Ungrateful people forget what they are not grateful for.
quotes.author: Ana Monnar

quotes.quote: Earth produces nothing worse than an ungrateful man.
quotes.author: Decimius Magnus Ausonius

quotes.quote: Ingratitude is monstrous; and for the multitude to be ungrateful, were to make a monster of the multitude.
quotes.author: Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Flints may be melted— we see it daily— but an ungrateful heart cannot be; not by the strongest and noblest flame.
quotes.author: South

quotes.quote: How sharper than a serpent's tooth it is to have a thankless child.
quotes.author: Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Unhappiness is an unfinished state; happy people don't need our help.
quotes.author: Hugh Laurie

quotes.quote: All unhappiness is due to the ego. With it comes all your trouble. If you would deny the ego and scorch it by ignoring it you would be free.
quotes.author: Ramana Maharshi

quotes.quote: All human unhappiness comes from not facing reality squarely, exactly as it is.
quotes.author: Gautama Buddha

quotes.quote: All mankind's unhappiness derives from one thing: his inability to know how to remain in repose in one room.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: Unhappiness isn't at its most acute point until a realistic chance of happiness, sufficiently close, has been envisioned.
quotes.author: Michel Houellebecq

quotes.quote: We are sometimes dragged into a pit of unhappiness by someone else's opinion that we do not look happy.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: Unhappiness and dissatisfaction with life are not signs of mental illness, but of growing intelligence.
quotes.author: Ken Wilber

quotes.quote: If our life is unhappy it is painful to bear; if it is happy it is horrible to lose, So the one is pretty equal to the other.
quotes.author: Jean De La Bruyere

quotes.quote: The primary cause of unhappiness is never the situation but your thoughts about it.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: Unhappiness is really an incorrect way of seeing. When we are unhappy we don't see life as it really is. We are in a condition of veiled light, of shadows.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: The unhappiest people in this world, are those who care the most about what other people think.
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: You have to fight unhappiness like a dragon with fire and breathe.
quotes.author: Drew Barrymore

quotes.quote: Your unhappiness is a way of speaking to you, it's telling you something isn't right.
quotes.author: Robert Greene

quotes.quote: No one is discontented at not being a king except a discrowned king unhappiness almost invariably indicates the existence of a road not taken, a talent undeveloped, a self not recognized.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: The cause of most of man's unhappiness is sacrificing what he wants most for what he wants now.
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.quote: By becoming more unhappy, we sometimes learn how to be less so.
quotes.author: Madame Swetchine

quotes.quote: Unhappiness is not knowing what we want, and killing ourselves to get it.
quotes.author: Don Herold

quotes.quote: The unhappy are prisoners of a single round of thought.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: Unhappiness is not knowing what we want and killing ourselves to get it.
quotes.author: Don Herold

quotes.quote: There is only one cause of unhappiness: the false beliefs you have in your head, beliefs so widespread, so commonly held, that it never occurs to you to question them.
quotes.author: Anthony De Mello

quotes.quote: All unhappiness is caused by our trying to be limited, to be an ego. The more we are our Self, the happier we are. We will never be completely happy until we are completely being our Self.
quotes.author: Lester Levenson

quotes.quote: If a man is unhappy, remember that his unhappiness is his own fault, for God made all men to be happy.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: Unhappy people often insist on trying to uncover the full magnitude of their unhappiness, or choose to investigate other people's lives as a distraction from their own.
quotes.author: Javier Marías

quotes.quote: Unhappiness in one place doesn't breed happiness elsewhere. It just breeds more unhappiness.
quotes.author: Callie Bates

quotes.quote: Unhappiness is something we are never taught about; we are taught to expect happiness, but never a Plan B to use to use when the happiness doesn't arrive.
quotes.author: Douglas Coupland

quotes.quote: Unhappiness slowly creeps up on you, like a shape-shifting monster waiting in the darkness of your hallway, his bulging eyes watching your every move. The breath on his slimy tongue makes the hairs on your neck stand up.
quotes.author: Kate Rockland

quotes.quote: Unhappiness indicates wrong thinking, just as ill health indicates a bad regimen.
quotes.author: Paul Bourget

quotes.quote: Much unhappiness has come into the world because of bewilderment and things left unsaid.
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quotes.quote: Unhappiness does make people look stupid.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.quote: We create our own unhappiness. The purpose of suffering is to help us understand we are the ones who cause it.
quotes.author: Willie Nelson

quotes.quote: When you can't change the direction of the wind - adjust your sails.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

quotes.quote: It doesn’t matter who you are, where you come from. The ability to triumph begins with you. Always.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: I will love the light for it shows me the way, yet I will endure the darkness because it shows me the stars.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: What we think determines what happens to us, so if we want to change our lives, we need to stretch our minds.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: There is no passion to be found playing small-in settling for a life that is less than the one you are capable of living.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity. The fears are paper tigers. You can do anything you decide to do. You can act to change and control your life; and the procedure, the process is its own reward.
quotes.author: Amelia Earhart

quotes.quote: My mission in life is not merely to survive, but to thrive; and to do so with some passion, some compassion, some humor, and some style.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Although the world is full of suffering, it is also full of the overcoming of it.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: We must accept finite disappointment, but we must never lose infinite hope.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising up every time we fall.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: It doesn’t matter how slow you go as long as you don’t stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Life is a series of natural and spontaneous changes. Don't resist them-that only creates sorrow. Let reality be reality. Let things flow naturally forward in whatever way they like.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: I've failed over and over and over again in my life and that is why I succeed.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.quote: Life is not about how fast you run or how high you climb, but how well you bounce.
quotes.author: Vivian Komori

quotes.quote: Life is 10 percent what happens to you and 90 percent how you respond to it.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.quote: Our greatest happiness does not depend on the condition of life in which chance has placed us, but is always the result of a good conscience, good health, occupation, and freedom in all just pursuits.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Remember your dreams and fight for them. You must know what you want from life. There is just one thing that makes your dream become impossible: the fear of failure.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Life takes on meaning when you become motivated, set goals and charge after them in an unstoppable manner.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: Today is life-the only life you are sure of. Make the most of today. Get interested in something. Shake yourself awake. Develop a hobby. Let the winds of enthusiasm sweep through you. Live today with gusto.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Breath .. you're going to be ok, you've been here before.. you've been this scared, uncomfortable and anxious and know you can survive this too..I know it all feels unbearable right now, just breath, keep breathing..this too shall pass I promise.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: Victory comes from finding opportunities in problems.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: Victory is not the absence of problems, it is the presence of power.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Embrace uncertainty. Some of the most beautiful chapters in our lives won’t have a title until much later.
quotes.author: Bob Goff

quotes.quote: Believe that life is worth living and your belief will help create the fact.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Union of hearts, not hands, does a marriage make, and sympathy of mind keeps love awake.
quotes.author: Aaron Hill

quotes.quote: As love is union, it knows no extremes of distance.
quotes.author: Juana Inés de la Cruz

quotes.quote: All union is effected by love, and love is not love without trust.
quotes.author: Emanuel Swedenborg

quotes.quote: Friendship is the union of spirits, a marriage of hearts, and the bond thereof virtue.
quotes.author: William Penn

quotes.quote: The union of nature and soul removes the veil of ignorance that covers our intelligence.
quotes.author: B.K.S. Iyengar

quotes.quote: Love is a state of union. When you can receive love, you can know union.
quotes.author: Sandra Ingerman

quotes.quote: The creative union of the conscious with the unconscious is what one usually calls 'inspiration.'
quotes.author: Leon Trotsky

quotes.quote: In union there is strength.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: The force of union conquers all.
quotes.author: Homer

quotes.quote: Union gives strength to the humble.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: Union of religious sentiments begets a surprising confidence.
quotes.author: James Madison

quotes.quote: All union is effected by love, and love is not love without trust.
quotes.author: Emanuel Swedenborg

quotes.quote: Unions are susceptible to the same ills that befall all human societies.
quotes.author: Tony Kushner

quotes.quote: The union of feminine and masculine energies within the individual is the basis of all creation.
quotes.author: Shakti Gawain

quotes.quote: A happy union with wife and child is like the music of lutes and harps.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Union of religious sentiments begets a surprising confidence.
quotes.author: James Madison

quotes.quote: Union with God is the only heaven there is, and it begins here on earth.
quotes.author: Macrina Wiederkehr

quotes.quote: The only thing sweeter than union is reunion.
quotes.author: Kathleen McGowan

quotes.quote: One's art is just one's effort to wed oneself to the universe, to unify oneself through union.
quotes.author: Robert Motherwell

quotes.quote: The union of the family lies in love; and love is the only reconciliation of authority and liberty.
quotes.author: Robert Hugh Benson

quotes.quote: Real prayer is union with God, a union as vital as that of the vine to the branch.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: The union of the mathematician with the poet, fervor with measure, passion with correctness, this surely is the ideal.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: A family is really a union of two separate entities. When you get married, you are marrying one family into another.
quotes.author: Patricia Rae

quotes.quote: The union of the mind and intuition which brings about illumination, and the development which the Sufis seek, is based upon love.
quotes.author: Idries Shah

quotes.quote: Love is union with somebody, or something, outside oneself, under the condition of retaining the separateness and integrity of one's own self.
quotes.author: Erich Fromm

quotes.quote: Yoga means union, that in your experience, everything has become one.
quotes.author: Jaggi Vasudev

quotes.quote: By union the smallest states thrive. By discord the greatest are destroyed.
quotes.author: Sallust

quotes.quote: The true state of the union lies in your heart, and in your home.
quotes.author: Cathy McMorris Rodgers

quotes.quote: Marriage is an exclusive union between one man and one woman, publicly acknowledged, permanently sealed, and physically consummated.
quotes.author: Selwyn Hughes

quotes.quote: The deepest desire of our hearts is for union for God. God created us for union with himself. This is the original purpose of our lives.
quotes.author: Brennan Manning

quotes.quote: The United Nations is like a spade; it is not self-operating. It is what we make of it, for purposes that we can find in common with our neighbors in the world.
quotes.author: Adlai Stevenson

quotes.quote: In a sense, the United Nations is like a vase. Without a vase there can be no lasting bouquet of flowers; but the aroma--or perfume--depends on the flowers, not on the vase.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The United Nations is our conscience. If it succeeds it is our success. If it fails it is our failure.
quotes.author: Barbara Hepworth

quotes.quote: The UN wasn’t created to take mankind into paradise, but rather, to save humanity from hell.
quotes.author: Dag Hammarskjold

quotes.quote: The United Nations rose from the ashes of destruction, and created a magnificent vision for all of humankind: to save succeeding generations from the scourge of war, and protect universal human rights.
quotes.author: Jose Ramos - Horta

quotes.quote: The whole basis of the United Nations is the right of all nations—great or small—to have weight, to have a vote, to be attended to, to be a part of the twentieth century.
quotes.author: Adlai Stevenson

quotes.quote: The United Nations is designed to make possible lasting freedom and independence for all its members.
quotes.author: Harry S Truman

quotes.quote: The United Nations system is still the best instrument for making the world less fragile.
quotes.author: Carlo Azeglio Ciampi

quotes.quote: The United Nations is our world's greatest mechanism for making peace.
quotes.author: Gillian Sorensen

quotes.quote: The United Nations is our one great hope for a peaceful and free world.
quotes.author: Ralph Bunche

quotes.quote: The United Nations is an organizational body where people, through their Governments, come together; and it can be the only place where there can be a melting pot.
quotes.author: Asma Jahangir

quotes.quote: The U.N. acts as the world's conscience, and over eighty-five percent of the work that is done by the United Nations is in the social, economic, educational and cultural fields.
quotes.author: Shirley Temple

quotes.quote: The reality is that international institutions like the UN can only be as effective as its members allow it to be.
quotes.author: Atal Bihari Vajpayee

quotes.quote: The United Nations has a proud record of helping millions of people in mine-affected countries.
quotes.author: Ban Ki-moon

quotes.quote: The heroes of the world community are not those who withdraw when difficulties ensue, not those who can envision neither the prospect of success nor the consequence of failure — but those who stand the heat of battle, the fight for world peace through the United Nations.
quotes.author: Hubert Humphrey

quotes.quote: We are different; we are always have been and always will be. However, different shouldn't divide us, but unify us because different is an asset.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Margo

quotes.quote: Unity to be real must stand the severest strain without breaking.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Unity without verity is no better than conspiracy.
quotes.author: John Trapp

quotes.quote: So powerful is the light of unity that it can illuminate the whole earth.
quotes.author: Baha'U'Llah

quotes.quote: Unity is strength, division is weakness.
quotes.author: Swahili Proverb

quotes.quote: Unity is strength. . . when there is teamwork and collaboration, wonderful things can be achieved.
quotes.author: Mattie Stepanek

quotes.quote: The significance which is in unity is an eternal wonder.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: No doubt, unity is something to be desired, to be striven for, but it cannot be willed by mere declarations.
quotes.author: Theodore Bikel

quotes.quote: Behold, how good and how pleasant it is for brothers to dwell together in unity.
quotes.author: Bible

quotes.quote: United we stand, divided we fall.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: Even the weak become strong when they are united.
quotes.author: Friedrich von Schiller

quotes.quote: Where there is unity there is always victory.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: There is more power in unity than division.
quotes.author: Emanuel Cleaver

quotes.quote: Where destruction is the motive, unity is dangerous.
quotes.author: Ravi Zacharias

quotes.quote: In union there is strength.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: Not in numbers but in unity that our great strength lies.
quotes.author: Thomas Paine

quotes.quote: Unity is plural and, at minimum, is two.
quotes.author: Buckminster Fuller

quotes.quote: In Unity there is strength; We can move mountains when we're united and enjoy life --Without unity we are victims. Stay united.
quotes.author: Bill Bailey

quotes.quote: When spiders unite, they can tie down a lion.
quotes.author: Ethiopian Proverb

quotes.quote: You can't have unity without diversity.
quotes.author: Richard Twiss

quotes.quote: Unity is a beast in itself. If a wolf sees two little boys playing in the woods on one side, and a big strong man on the other, he will go to the one who stands alone.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: Unity is vision; it must have been part of the process of learning to see.
quotes.author: Henry Adams

quotes.quote: There is beauty and power in unity.We must be united in heart and mind.One world, one people.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Unity can only come when there is better co-ordination and mutual understanding in the society; when there is no friction of thoughts and clash of ideologies. We should therefore follow the ideals established by the scholars and engage ourselves in virtuous deeds.
quotes.author: Atharva Veda

quotes.quote: You don't get unity by ignoring the questions that have to be faced.
quotes.author: Jay Weatherill

quotes.quote: For the strength of the Pack is the Wolf, and the strength of the Wolf is the Pack.
quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.quote: Unity and victory are synonymous.
quotes.author: Samora Machel

quotes.quote: All for one, and one for all.
quotes.author: Alexandre Dumas

quotes.quote: Remember upon the conduct of each depends the fate of all.
quotes.author: Alexander The Great

quotes.quote: We cannot be separated in interest or divided in purpose. We stand together until the end.
quotes.author: Woodrow T Wilson

quotes.quote: A smile is the universal welcome.
quotes.author: Max Eastman

quotes.quote: Communication is the universal solvent.
quotes.author: L. Ron Hubbard

quotes.quote: Truth is universal. Perception of truth varies.
quotes.author: Bohdi Sanders

quotes.quote: Hope is the most universal of human possessions.
quotes.author: Thales

quotes.quote: Mistakes are the only universal form of originality.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: Universal compassion is the only guarantee of morality.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: Movement is the universal language of personal freedom.
quotes.author: Louis Chevrolet

quotes.quote: Ideas are universal, the names and titles we give them are not.
quotes.author: Paul Pavlo Shiller

quotes.quote: The universal brotherhood of man is our most precious possession.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Kindness is a universal language regardless of age, nationality or religion.
quotes.author: Alex Ferguson

quotes.quote: Universal happiness keeps the wheels steadily turning, truth and beauty can't.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: A universal beauty clothes the world, And one heart seems to beat for all mankind!
quotes.author: Robert Montgomery

quotes.quote: Empathy is like a universal solvent. Any problem immersed in empathy becomes soluble.
quotes.author: Simon Baron-Cohen

quotes.quote: True compassion is universal in scope. It is accompanied by a feeling of responsibility.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Be universal in your love. You will see the universe to be the picture of your own being.
quotes.author: Sri Chinmoy

quotes.quote: Music is the universal language of mankind.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: Experience is the universal mother of sciences.
quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes

quotes.quote: All universal moral principles are idle fancies.
quotes.author: Marquis De Sade

quotes.quote: A happy mind is also a beautiful, universal mind.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: Nature is the common, universal language, understood by all.
quotes.author: Kathleen Raine

quotes.quote: In order to be universal, you have to be rooted in your own culture.
quotes.author: Abbas Kiarostami

quotes.quote: Rhythm is our universal mother tongue. It's the language of the soul.
quotes.author: Gabrielle Roth

quotes.quote: Bereavement is a universal and integral part of our experience of love.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: To create a new universal idea is to create a new star in the universe!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Paying attention and awareness are universal capacities of human beings.
quotes.author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

quotes.quote: Making universal prosperity a right is the surest way to universal poverty.
quotes.author: JSB Morse

quotes.quote: Universal emptiness is mere concept. The fact is, there was never emptiness.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: The universal erosion of values has lead to the universal erosion of story.
quotes.author: Robert McKee

quotes.quote: A universal feeling, whether well or ill-founded cannot be safely disregarded.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Music is healing and soothing. It is the universal language of kindness and love.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: There is only one corner of the universe you can be certain of improving, and that's your own self.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: Only two things are infinite, the universe and human stupidity, and I'm not sure about the former.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: There are no extra pieces in the universe. Everyone is here because he or she has a place to fill, and every piece must fit itself into the big jigsaw puzzle.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: All the powers in the universe are already ours. It is we who have put our hands before our eyes and cry that it is dark.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekanada

quotes.quote: I'm sure the universe is full of intelligent life. It's just been too intelligent to come here.
quotes.author: Arthur C. Clarke

quotes.quote: I bet you could sometimes find all the mysteries of the universe in someone's hand.
quotes.author: Benjamin Alire Saenz

quotes.quote: Believe something and the Universe is on its way to being changed. Because you've changed, by believing. Once you've changed, other things start to follow. Isn't that the way it works?”
quotes.author: Diane Duane

quotes.quote: The universe doesn’t give you what you ask for with your thoughts - it gives you what you demand with your actions.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: If you think this Universe is bad, you should see some of the others.
quotes.author: Philip K. Dick

quotes.quote: If the whole universe has no meaning, we should never have found out that it has no meaning: just as, if there were no light in the universe and therefore no creatures with eyes, we should never know it was dark. Dark would be a word without meaning.
quotes.author: C.S Lewis

quotes.quote: The Universe is under no obligation to make sense to you.
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.quote:
The Universe is very, very big.
It also loves a paradox. For example, it has some extremely strict rules.
Rule number one: Nothing lasts forever.
Not you or your family or your house or your planet or the sun. It is an absolute rule. Therefore when someone says that their love will never die, it means that their love is not real, for everything that is real dies.
Rule number two: Everything lasts forever
quotes.author: Craig Ferguson

quotes.quote: Through our eyes, the universe is perceiving itself. Through our ears, the universe is listening to its harmonies. We are the witnesses through which the universe becomes conscious of its glory, of its magnificence.
quotes.author: Alan Wilson Watts

quotes.quote: The universe seems neither benign nor hostile, merely indifferent to the concerns of such puny creatures as we are.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: Look up at the stars and not down at your feet. Try to make sense of what you see, and wonder about what makes the universe exist. Be curious.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.quote: The universe is transformation: life is opinion.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: The clearest way into the Universe is through a forest wilderness.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: They say the universe is expanding. That should help with the traffic.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: The reason why the universe is eternal is that it does not live for itself; it gives life to others as it transforms.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: We are an impossibility in an impossible universe.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.quote: The universe is big, its vast and complicated, and ridiculous. And sometimes, very rarely, impossible things just happen and we call them miracles. And that's the theory. Nine hundred years, never seen one yet, but this would do me.
quotes.author: Steven Mofatt

quotes.quote: The universe is a pretty big place. If it's just us, seems like an awful waste of space.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote:
We may not get to choose how we die, but we can chose how we live.
The universe may forget us, but it doesn't matter. Because we are the ants, and we'll keep marching on.
quotes.author: Shaun David Hutchinson

quotes.quote: Look at the sky. We are not alone. The whole universe is friendly to us and conspires only to give the best to those who dream and work.
quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quotes.quote: In the concentration camps, we discovered this whole universe where everyone had his place. The killer came to kill, and the victims came to die.
quotes.author: Ellie Wiesel

quotes.quote: The Universe is not only queerer than we suppose, but queerer than we can suppose.
quotes.author: J.B.S. Haldane

quotes.quote: The whole universe is based on rhythms. Everything happens in circles, in spirals.
quotes.author: John Hartford

quotes.quote: That's what university life is all about. Challenging, questioning, enjoying good people and good friends, and pushing yourself to the limit.
quotes.author: David Robinson

quotes.quote: A man who has never gone to school may steal from a freight car; but if he has a university education, he may steal the whole railroad.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The University brings out all abilities, including incapability.
quotes.author: Anton Chekhov

quotes.quote: A truly great university is a nucleus of artistic expression. It fosters creative, critical thought, and serves as a platform for civil discourse.
quotes.author: Gordon Gee

quotes.quote: The task of a university is the creation of the future, so far as rational thought and civilized modes of appreciation can affect the issue.
quotes.author: Alfred North Whitehead

quotes.quote: The medieval university looked backwards; it professed to be a storehouse of old knowledge. The modern university looks forward, and is a factory of new knowledge.
quotes.author: Thomas Huxley

quotes.quote: The most important function of the university in an age of reason is to protect reason from itself.
quotes.author: Allan Bloom

quotes.quote: It is the goal of the American university to be the brains of the republic.
quotes.author: Johan Huizinga

quotes.quote: The purpose of the university is to make students safe for ideas - not ideas safe for students.
quotes.author: Clark Kerr

quotes.quote: The university is our culture's assertion that what is made by the mind has value and can convey values.
quotes.author: A. Bartlett Giamatti

quotes.quote: University's like this little world, a bubble of time separate from everything before and everything after.
quotes.author: Mhairi McFarlane

quotes.quote: The privilege of a university education is a great one; the more widely it is extended the better for any country.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: A university is what a college becomes when the faculty loses interest in the students.
quotes.author: John Ciardi

quotes.quote: The use of a university is to make young gentlemen as unlike their fathers as possible.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.quote: It is not the task of the University to offer what society asks for, but to give what society needs.
quotes.author: Edsger W. Dijkstra

quotes.quote: The university is a series of individual entrepreneurs held together by a common grievance about parking.
quotes.author: Clark Kerr

quotes.quote: A university educates the intellect to reason well in all matters, to reach out towards truth, and to grasp it.
quotes.author: John Henry Newman

quotes.quote: The University conceives of itself as dedicated to the power of the intellect. Its commitment is to the way of reason.
quotes.author: Edward Levi

quotes.quote: A University should be a place of light, of liberty, and of learning.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: The true university of these days is a collection of books.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: A university is not a political party, and an education is not an indoctrination.
quotes.author: David Horowitz

quotes.quote: A university is supposed to be a place where all ideas are discussed.
quotes.author: Jerry Falwell

quotes.quote: When students get into a great university, it's a huge aspirational lift for their village. These students become beacons of hope.
quotes.author: Roshni Nadar

quotes.quote: In the modern university, no act of good teaching goes unpunished.
quotes.author: Charlie Sykes

quotes.quote: The best university is the university of life.
quotes.author: Henrique Capriles Radonski

quotes.quote: He who enters a university walks on hallowed ground.
quotes.author: James Bryant Conant

quotes.quote: The university is the last remaining platform for national dissent.
quotes.author: Leon Eisenberg

quotes.quote: A university is just a group of buildings gathered around a library. The library is the university.
quotes.author: Shelby Foote

quotes.quote: The university has become a place that prepares you for the fights in the world.
quotes.author: Henri Nouwen

quotes.quote: University is the best couple of years of your life. Nowhere else can you drink and chase as many birds.
quotes.author: Michael O'Leary

quotes.quote: People are lucky andÂ unluckyÂ not according to what they get absolutely, but according to the ratio between what they get and what they have been led to expect.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: It is the nature of the unfortunate to be spiteful, and to envy those who are well to do.
quotes.author: Plautus

quotes.quote: I'm the luckiestÂ unluckyÂ person.
quotes.author: Tig Notaro

quotes.quote: HowÂ unfortunateÂ is the guy who does not live in the extravagant memory of an infatuated young woman.
quotes.author: Manu Joseph

quotes.quote: Sometimes what might seem to be a series of unfortunate events may be the first steps of a beautiful journey.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: If you're unlucky enough not to have alcoholic parents, it takes you a whole lifetime of intoxication to overcome the dead weight of their virtues.
quotes.author: Emile M. Cioran

quotes.quote: It is anÂ unfortunateÂ human failing that a full pocketbook often groans more loudly than an empty stomach.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: It's extremely unlucky to be superstitious, for no other reason than it is always unlucky to be colossally stupid.
quotes.author: Stephen Fry

quotes.quote: It'sÂ unfortunate, you know, that you can't change people's - habits, their personal habits.
quotes.author: Linda McMahon

quotes.quote: TheÂ unfortunateÂ do not pity theÂ unfortunate.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: It'sÂ unfortunateÂ that sometimes in schools, there's this need to have things quantified and graded.
quotes.author: Rita Dove

quotes.quote: It is unlucky to sound off about happiness.Â
quotes.author: I Ching

quotes.quote: How unfortunate, considering I have decided to loathe him for eternity.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: Look at those they callÂ unfortunateÂ and at a closer view, you'll find many of them are unwise.
quotes.author: Andrew Young

quotes.quote: UnfortunateÂ and wretched are those who have respected a book they did not love and hated those they did.
quotes.author: Milorad Pavić

quotes.quote: If lucky be not proud; if unlucky, do not despond.
quotes.author: Decimius Magnus Ausonius

quotes.quote: I never thought of myself asÂ unlucky. When you aim high, it's tough to get there unless something really fortunate happens.
quotes.author: Henry Cavill

quotes.quote: AnÂ unfortunateÂ thing about this world is that the good habits are much easier to give up than the bad ones.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: Unlucky people are stuck in routines. When they see something new, they want no part of it. Lucky people always want something new. They're prepared to take risks and relaxed enough to see the opportunities in the first place.
quotes.author: Richard Wiseman

quotes.quote: It's alwaysÂ unfortunateÂ when something gets misreported and the facts are not clear.
quotes.author: Roger Goodell

quotes.quote: The most unfortunate thing that happens to a person who fears failure is that he limits himself by becoming afraid to try anything new.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.quote: He is soÂ unluckyÂ that he runs into accidents which start out to happen to somebody else.
quotes.author: Don Marquis

quotes.quote: TheÂ unfortunateÂ are always egotistical.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: The mostÂ unluckyÂ generation is the one which couldn't produce a hero to look upto.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: Sometimes even in mostÂ unfortunateÂ of lives there will occur a moment or two of good.
quotes.author: Daniel Handler

quotes.quote: But like so many unfortunate events in life, just because you don't understand it doesn't mean it isn't so.
quotes.author: Lemony Snicket

quotes.quote: It's unfortunate biologically we have to sleep.
quotes.author: Aaron Levie

quotes.quote: HowÂ unfortunateÂ it is to be constrained by what people might say at our funeral or on our gravestone.
quotes.author: Lawrence Fagg

quotes.quote: There is an unlucky tendency ... to allow every new invention to add to life's complications, and every new power to increase life's hustling; so that, unless we can dominate the mischief, we are really the worse off instead of the better.
quotes.author: Vernon Lee

quotes.quote: theÂ unfortunateÂ thing about worldliness is that its rewards are rather less than its appetites.
quotes.author: Phyllis Bottome

quotes.quote: Be careful to not haul around in our lives so many nice but unnecessary things that we are distracted and diverted from the things that truly matter most.
quotes.author: David A. Bednar

quotes.quote: We are prisoners of the unnecessary things we amass, and the only way to discover our beautiful true selves is by chipping everything unnecessary out of our lives.
quotes.author: Dr Prem Jagyasi

quotes.quote: Great is the guilt of an unnecessary war.
quotes.author: John Adams

quotes.quote: Man's role is uncertain, undefined, and perhaps unnecessary.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.quote: Civilization is the limitless multiplication of unnecessary necessities.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Just like sweeping the streets, sweep the unnecessary things from your mind too; keep your mind clean!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: We live in an age when unnecessary things are our only necessities.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: I am completely attracted to the idea of simplicity, or at least removing things that seem unnecessary when trying to get an idea out there.
quotes.author: Demetri Martin

quotes.quote: Be discreet in all things, and so render it unnecessary to be mysterious about any.
quotes.author: Duke of Wellington

quotes.quote: Unnecessary silence upon emotions and exigency is an act of self-immolation of your rights and ways.
quotes.author: Ehsan Sehgal

quotes.quote: When two men in business always agree, one of them is unnecessary.
quotes.author: Ezra Pound

quotes.quote: Give thanks to God, who made necessary things simple, and complicated things unnecessary.
quotes.author: Gregory Skovoroda

quotes.quote: The ability to simplify means to eliminate the unnecessary so that the necessary may speak.
quotes.author: Hans Hofmann

quotes.quote: If two people were exactly alike, one of them would be unnecessary.
quotes.author: Larry Dixon

quotes.quote: If a man does not work at necessary and good things, then he will work at unnecessary and stupid things.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: Unity in things Necessary, Liberty in things Unnecessary, and Charity in all.
quotes.author: Richard Baxter

quotes.quote: We are ignorant of things necessary, because we learn things superfluous and unnecessary.
quotes.author: Richard Baxter

quotes.quote: What is necessary is possible, what we want is expensive. What is unnecessary is unlikely.
quotes.author: Robert Fripp

quotes.quote: A wise man will make haste to forgive, because he knows the true value of time, and will not suffer it to pass away in unnecessary pain.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: I do a good job of blocking painful, unnecessary things from my memory.
quotes.author: Stephenie Meyer

quotes.quote: To me an unnecessary action, or shot, or casualty, was not only waste but sin.
quotes.author: T. E. Lawrence

quotes.quote: Stress is unnecessary and unnecessary stress is very unnecessary.
quotes.author: TemitOpe Ibrahim

quotes.quote: All of our technology is completely unnecessary to a happy life.
quotes.author: Tom Hodgkinson

quotes.quote: The government is best which makes itself unnecessary.
quotes.author: Wilhelm Von Humboldt

quotes.quote: If your mind isn't clouded by unnecessary things, This is the best season of your life.
quotes.author: Wumen Huikai

quotes.quote: Friendship is unnecessary, like philosophy, like art... It has no survival value; rather it is one of those things that give value to survival.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: The design of everyday things is in great danger of becoming the design of superfluous, overloaded, unnecessary things.
quotes.author: Donald A. Norman

quotes.quote: Our vision for the world is making car ownership unnecessary.
quotes.author: Logan Green

quotes.quote: Fear is sort of like jealousy. It's an unnecessary emotion.
quotes.author: Matt Skiba

quotes.quote: Memory is the greatest of artists, and effaces from your mind what is unnecessary.
quotes.author: Maurice Baring

quotes.quote: Truth will only make you unpopular.
quotes.author: Wolfgang Borchert

quotes.quote: An unpopular rule is never long maintained.
quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.quote: Unpopular but right is what you're going for.
quotes.author: Sam Altman

quotes.quote: In all the world, rich people are very unpopular.
quotes.author: Victor Pinchuk

quotes.quote: Chastity is the most unpopular of the Christian virtues.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Intelligent people are always on the unpopular side of anything.
quotes.author: Kin Hubbard

quotes.quote: First make yourself unpopular, then you will be taken seriously.
quotes.author: Konrad Adenauer

quotes.quote: Unpopular speech is absolutely vital to the health of our nation.
quotes.author: Edward Norton

quotes.quote: All progress has resulted from people who took unpopular positions.
quotes.author: Adlai E. Stevenson Ii

quotes.quote: At times unpopular measures are needed in order to change behaviour.
quotes.author: Lucy Powell

quotes.quote: To solve big problems you have to be willing to do unpopular things.
quotes.author: Lee Iacocca

quotes.quote: Sometimes in this world you make unpopular decisions because you think they're right.
quotes.author: George W. Bush

quotes.quote: Human beings do not like to look squarely into the face of tragedy. Gloom is unpopular.
quotes.author: Saul Alinsky

quotes.quote: Unpopularity is a excellent salve to the conscience; it is delicious to be misunderstood.
quotes.author: Stella Benson

quotes.quote: Honesty and unpopular opinions are the toughest sell in a country with an irony-deficiency.
quotes.author: Greg Proops

quotes.quote: Being unpopular is never easy; but being unpopular in a good cause is a shield against despair.
quotes.author: Roger Scruton

quotes.quote: When you allow yourself to be unpredictable, you step from the known into the unknown, where anything is possible.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: The more unpredictable the world is the more we rely on predictions.
quotes.author: Steve Rivkin

quotes.quote: Life is no different than the weather. Not only is it unpredictable, but it shows us a new perspective of the world every day.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: The truth is most women are weak, be they mortal or immortal. But when they are strong, they are absolutely unpredictable.
quotes.author: Anna Rice

quotes.quote: Life is a desert of shifting sand dunes. Unpredictable. Erratic. Harmony changes into dissonance, the immediate outlives the profound, esoteric becomes cliched. And vice versa.
quotes.author: Ella Leya

quotes.quote: Happiness came in moments of unpredictable loveliness.
quotes.author: Anthony Marra

quotes.quote: The very nature of interactions is bound to make it unpredictable.
quotes.author: Carl von Clausewitz

quotes.quote: The course of life is unpredictable, no one can write his autobiography in advance.
quotes.author: Rabbi Abraham Heschel

quotes.quote: Others follow patterns; we alone are unpredictable.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: Love is as irrational as hate and just as unpredictable.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: When you can become completely impassive in play, then you become fluid and completely unpredictable. No one knows, including yourself, what you will do next. You couldn't even explain it.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Nothing is written in stone, as a career is an unpredictable journey.
quotes.author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quotes.quote: At odd and unpredictable times, we cling in fright to the past.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: The idea that the future is unpredictable is undermined every day by the ease with which the past is explained.
quotes.author: Daniel Kahneman

quotes.quote: How complicated and unpredictable the machinery of life really is.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote: The world is so unpredictable. Things happen suddenly, unexpectedly. We want to feel we are in control of our own existence. In some ways we are, in some ways we're not. We are ruled by the forces of chance and coincidence.
quotes.author: Paul Auster

quotes.quote: Children are unpredictable. You never know what inconsistency they are going to catch you in next.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Be unpredictable, be real, be interesting. Tell a good story.
quotes.author: James Dashner

quotes.quote: At its best, life is completely unpredictable.
quotes.author: Christopher Walken

quotes.quote: Life is unpredictable when you get non-standard behavior patterns.
quotes.author: Jake Busey

quotes.quote: Life is unpredictable and you need to live every day to the fullest.
quotes.author: Doug Hutchison

quotes.quote: My heart no longer felt as if it belonged to me. It now felt as it had been stolen, torn from my chest by someone who wanted no part of it.
quotes.author: Meredith T. Taylor

quotes.quote: The worst feeling is falling for someone and knowing that they wont be there to catch you.
quotes.author: Rashida Rowe

quotes.quote: When you give someone your whole heart and he doesn't want it, you cannot take it back. It's gone forever.
quotes.author: Sylvia Plath

quotes.quote: Unrequited love differs from mutual love, just like delusion differs from the truth.
quotes.author: George Sand

quotes.quote: You like someone who can't like you back because unrequited love can be survived in a way that once-requited love cannot.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: I know I am but summer to your heart, And not the full four seasons of the year.
quotes.author: Edna St. Vincent Millay

quotes.quote: I came hoping to see those eyes, but instead I return with my heart, leaving behind only flowers.
quotes.author: Kim Dong Hwa

quotes.quote: You lose yourself trying to hold on to someone who doesn't care about losing you
quotes.author: Tablo

quotes.quote: I knew I was in love with you. Was I an idiot for thinking you were in love with me too?
quotes.author: Jesu Nadal

quotes.quote: No one understands why you do certain things even when you know you're never going to get anything back.
quotes.author: Shahul Hussain

quotes.quote: Maybe one day you'll understand that hearts don't intend to break other hearts.
quotes.author: Marisa Donnelly

quotes.quote: The biggest curse in life is not loosing your love, but not being loved by someone you love.
quotes.author: Kiran Joshi

quotes.quote: Love unrequited is violent. He loves you so much that he's turned it into hate.
quotes.author: Lauren DeStefano

quotes.quote: The Hardest thing about being broken, isn't the Love you don't receive, it's the Love you long to give that nobody wants.
quotes.author: Dinesh Kumar Biran

quotes.quote: One of the greatest pain and agony is being in one sided love with someone.
quotes.author: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.quote: Sometimes the best feeling is not falling in love, it's falling out of love with someone who never really loved you.
quotes.author: Mitch Cuent

quotes.quote: When you are in a relationship with someone and all the heavy lifting is put on you then there is no way that person loves you.
quotes.author: Gichele Cocrelle

quotes.quote: Unrequited love is like hitting your head against a wall that isn't there.
quotes.author: Shannon Wheeler

quotes.quote: His hands are saying that he wants to hold her. His feet are saying that he wants to chase after her... He's probably forgotten that I'm here, beside him.
quotes.author: Ai Yazawa

quotes.quote: Never pretend to a love which you do not actually feel, for love is not ours to command.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.quote: Let no one who loves be called unhappy. Even love unreturned has its rainbow.
quotes.author: James Matthew Barrie

quotes.quote: An act of love that fails is just as much a part of the divine life as an act of love that succeeds, for love is measured by fullness, not by reception.
quotes.author: Harold Lokes

quotes.quote: If you don't receive love from the ones who are meant to love you, you will never stop looking for it.
quotes.author: Robert Goolrick

quotes.quote: I wish I had the guts to walk away from what we had. But I can't because I know you won't come after me, and that's what hurts the most.
quotes.author: Spencer Shirks

quotes.quote: I used to care so much. I used to fight for this. I tried my hardest to hold on and keep you but you didn't want this as much as I did. I didn't lose you. Let's be honest, you lost me.
quotes.author: Hemant smarty

quotes.quote: I wish I could stop loving you so that I could free myself of the pain of you not being able to love me back.
quotes.author: Cian Kim

quotes.quote: The love that last the longest is the love that is never returned.
quotes.author: William Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: You can close your eyes to the things you don't want to see, but you can't close your heart to the things you don't want to feel.
quotes.author: Johnny Depp

quotes.quote: Sometimes life sends us people who don't love us enough, to remind us of what we're worthy of.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: When you truly love someone, you don't hurt or cause them pain, that's how I painfully realized you didn't love me.
quotes.author: Michael Hayssus

quotes.quote: There are some people that should stay quiet, because they understand. As there are those that should stay quiet, because they don't understand. Some things are better left unsaid or voiced.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: Positive words left unsaid are like sachets of currency notes burnt in vain. Positive deeds left undone are like deep wells filled with soil to the brim. Do the undone, say the unsaid and turn the unturned.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: The things left unsaid to people we care about, and the void those unspoken words leave, often have more impact than what is said.
quotes.author: Tyler Knight

quotes.quote: Remember not only to say the right thing in the right place, but far more difficult still, to leave unsaid the wrong thing at the tempting moment.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: We are masters of the unsaid words, but slaves of those we let slip out.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: By swallowing evil words unsaid, no one has ever harmed his stomach.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: The bitterest tears shed over graves are for words left unsaid and deeds left undone.
quotes.author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

quotes.quote: The action of the soul is oftener in that which is felt and left unsaid than in that which is said in any conversation. It broods over every society, and men unconsciously seek for it in each other.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: I still grieve for the words unsaid. Something terrible happens when we stop the mouths of the dying before they are dead. A silence grows up between us then, profounder than the grave. If we force the dying to go speechless, the stone dropped into the well will fall forever before the answering splash is heard.
quotes.author: Faye Moskowitz

quotes.quote: There's a power that comes with silence. I had grown to fear the unsaid thing. So it felt like a release to say it-to admit that the risk wasn't just inside our walls-it was inside my skin. I was willing to claw, scratch, and bleed until I'd found it.
quotes.author: Ally Carter

quotes.quote: The kindness I have longest remembered has been of this sort, the sort unsaid; so far behind the speaker's lips that almost it already lay in my heart. It did not have far to go to be communicated.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: The unseen is almost always underlined with the unsaid.
quotes.author: Viet Thanh Nguyen

quotes.quote: Eyes speak the unsaid words. You need to be a good observer to understand them.
quotes.author: Avijeet Das

quotes.quote: Before you speak ask yourself if what you are going to say is true, is kind, is necessary, is helpful. If the answer is no, maybe what you are about to say should be left unsaid.
quotes.author: Bernard Meltzer

quotes.quote: One of the very best rules of conversation is to never, say anything which any of the company wish had been left unsaid.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: The real art of conversation is not only to say the right thing at the right place but to leave unsaid the wrong thing at the tempting moment.
quotes.author: Dorothy Nevill

quotes.quote: A word that has been said may be unsaid; it is but air. But when a deed is done, it cannot be undone, nor can our thoughts reach out to all the mischiefs that may follow.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: While some things are better left unsaid, some things should never be left unspoken.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Words have weight, something once said cannot be unsaid. Meaning is like a stone dropped into a pool; the ripples will spread and you cannot know what back they wash against.
quotes.author: Philippa Gregory

quotes.quote: Sometimes the words left unsaid are the words that could ment the most.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: What is left unsaid gets in the way of the relationship. What is left unasked-for is a missed opportunity.
quotes.author: Thomas Leonard

quotes.quote: Much unhappiness has come into the world because of bewilderment and things left unsaid.
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky
