quotes.quote: But sometimes, things are better to just hear. Some questions better left unasked. Some words better left unsaid. Because saying them doesn't make you matter any less.
quotes.author: A. Lynn

quotes.quote: There were so many things we left unsaid. Depending on how you look at it, whether you think it was worth saying it out loud, or better kept inside.
quotes.author: Diyar Harraz

quotes.quote: Often the difference between a successful marriage and a mediocre one consists of leaving about three or four things a day unsaid.
quotes.author: Harlan Miller

quotes.quote: Tact is the unsaid part of what you think; it's opposite, the unthought part of which you say.
quotes.author: Henry Van Dyke

quotes.quote: Not all words fit to their meanings. Sometimes what is said is not what is meant and what is meant is left unsaid.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: If we all spoke the truth there would be a great deal of unhappiness in the world, and particularly at such a time. Some things are better left unsaid.
quotes.author: Amanda Grange

quotes.quote: It's your place in the world; it's your life. Go on and do all you can with it, and make it the life you want to live.
quotes.author: Mae Jemison

quotes.quote: Easily mistaken, it is not about a love for adversity, it is about knowing a strength and a faith so great that adversity, in all its adverse manifestations, hardly even exists.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Run with your legs to be fast. Run with your mind to be faster. Run with your heart to be unstoppable.
quotes.author: Aalaynah Thompson

quotes.quote: You need to associate with people that inspire you, people that challenge you to rise higher, people that make you better. Don't waste your valuable time with people that are not adding to your growth. Your destiny is too important.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: If you think something is impossible, it is. Until you decide it's possible and you do it.
quotes.author: Jude Watson

quotes.quote: If you shoot for the stars and hit the moon, it's ok. But you've got to shoot for something. A lot of people don't even shoot.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Even the bravest of creatures have some fears but it is not enough to stop them from moving in the path they are destined to walk upon.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The question isn't who is going to let me; it's who is going to stop me.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: If you are not willing to learn, no one can help you. If you are determined to learn, no one can stop you.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: One person's disapproval shouldn't make you quit. If it's your passion, a thousand people screaming 'No!' still won't stop you!
quotes.author: Tammy Ferebee

quotes.quote: Do not pray for an easy life, pray for the strength to endure a difficult one.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: Stop doubting yourself, work hard and make it happen.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: We were meant to live courageous and bold lives and not lives of mediocrity. However, we have to live our lives actively and on purpose each day to be unstoppable.
quotes.author: Thomas Narofsky

quotes.quote: Believe in yourself and you will be unstoppable.
quotes.author: Emily Guay

quotes.quote: You need to find the power within to make things happen for yourself. When you realize this, you are unstoppable.
quotes.author: Christina Aguilera

quotes.quote: The moment you give up all thought of retreat or surrender you become an unstoppable force.
quotes.author: Tommy Newberry

quotes.quote: Only those who are willing to risk going too far can possibly find out how far one can go.
quotes.author: T.S. Elliot

quotes.quote: Life takes on meaning when you become motivated, set goals and charge after them in an unstoppable manner.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Work like there is someone working 24 hours a day to take it away from you.
quotes.author: Mark Cuban

quotes.quote: You've done it before and you can do it now. See the positive possibilities. Redirect the substantial energy of your frustration and turn it into positive, effective, unstoppable determination.
quotes.author: Ralph Marston

quotes.quote: You may suffer many defeats in this life, but you will not be defeated. You will rise after each trial stronger and wiser.
quotes.author: Leon Brown

quotes.quote: If you can go out into the world not letting it stop you when things don't go your way, then you're unstoppable.
quotes.author: Louis CK

quotes.quote: Don't let your alarm clock, be the only reason you wake up.
quotes.author: Ray Lewis

quotes.quote: The power of determination will make you unstoppable.
quotes.author: Jean Charest

quotes.quote: She was unstoppable, not because she did not have failures or doubts, but because she continued on despite them.
quotes.author: Beau Taplin

quotes.quote: What you focus on expands. Focus on what you are best at and you will be unstoppable.
quotes.author: Bill McDermott

quotes.quote: Do your thing. Do it unapologetically. Don't be discouraged by criticism. You probably already know what they're going to say. Pay no mind to the fear of failure. It's far more valuable than success. Take ownership, take chances, and have fun. And no matter what, don't ever stop doing your thing.
quotes.author: Asher Roth

quotes.quote: Really great entrepreneurs have this very special mix of unstoppable optimism and scathing paranoia.
quotes.author: Astro Teller

quotes.quote: The question isn't who is going to let me it's who is going to stop me.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: Behind every successful man there's a lot of unsuccessful years.
quotes.author: Bob Brown

quotes.quote: Successful and unsuccessful people do not vary greatly in their abilities. They vary in their desires to reach their potential.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Unsuccessful people get up whenever they feel like it and the first thing they do is watch television, read the paper, or check email. The rest of the day is pretty much 50% below maximum performance.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: The only difference between successful people and unsuccessful people is extraordinary determination.
quotes.author: Mary Kay Ash

quotes.quote: Most unsuccessful people let their fears and doubts have the final say in how they live their lives.
quotes.author: Hal Elrod

quotes.quote: Unsuccessful people get jealous when they watch the Mastery of others. Successful people get inspired.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.quote: The unsuccessful person is burdened by learning, and prefers to walk down familiar paths. Their distaste for learning stunts their growth and limits their influence.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: An unsuccessful person feels obliged to praise himself all the time because in order to feel happy, he must compensate for his failure in a virtual way!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat Ildan

quotes.quote: Man will always remain an unsuccessful creature till he stops being a mortal being!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat Ildan

quotes.quote: Nobody can give good advice better than an unsuccessful person coz he knows the taste of every unsuccessful story.
quotes.author: Meri Diary

quotes.quote: The most common habit of an unsuccessful person is to blame others.
quotes.author: Sunanda Munduli

quotes.quote: Don't let those unsuccessful opportunities dull the sparkle and shine inside you cause they are just a tiny part of your life. In this journey of life, we are going to get many of such opportunities.
quotes.author: Lisa Gupta

quotes.quote: Being unsuccessful is not the end of anybody, this is what shows a path towards success.
quotes.author: Vishal Das

quotes.quote: Unsuccessful people are the ones who are impressed by celebrity, by people's names and titles.
quotes.author: Robin S. Sharma

quotes.quote: He who reckons his own soul is successful; he who is heedless of it is unsuccessful.
quotes.author: Muhammad Kulayni

quotes.quote: Unsuccessful businessmen and workers do not have the same animus against the capitalist system as do the wordsmith intellectuals. Only the sense of unrecognized superiority, of entitlement betrayed, produces that animus.
quotes.author: Robert Nozick

quotes.quote: The fact that I'm going to be unsuccessful at times is pretty well-balanced by the fact that I'm going to be successful at others.
quotes.author: Rod Taylor

quotes.quote: Ninety-nine percent of who you are is invisible and untouchable.
quotes.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

quotes.quote: You cannot live when you are untouchable. Life is vulnerability.
quotes.author: Edouard Boubat

quotes.quote: Some things that are invisible and untouchable can nevertheless be seen and felt.
quotes.author: Michael Chabon

quotes.quote: I think we love the fantasy of being the one person who can really touch the person who has been untouchable for everybody else. There's something that makes us feel very special about that; that we could be the one out of everyone who's tried and everybody who's wanted to reach that person - you're the only one who could do it.
quotes.author: Sylvia Day

quotes.quote: I want to be untouchable and beautiful and completely dead inside.
quotes.author: Francesca Lia Block

quotes.quote: Better immersion than to live untouched.
quotes.author: Tillie Olsen

quotes.quote: All of them with their own lives, untouched by mine. Or each other's.
quotes.author: Simon Beckett

quotes.quote: I want to be a mystery to you, untouchable, a star all to myself, a galaxy away from your starved fingers.
quotes.author: Emily Palermo

quotes.quote: Life proceeds, it enrages. The untouched ones spend their luck without a thought, believing they deserve it.
quotes.author: Barbara Kingsolver

quotes.quote: Sometimes I have a terrible feeling that I am dying not from the virus, but from being untouchable.
quotes.author: Amanda Palmer

quotes.quote: These days, as I am older and wiser, I realize that there is a danger in becoming an icon, as people can see you as remote and untouchable, and they are less willing to tolerate you doing things that don't fit with their preconceived idea of you.
quotes.author: Giorgio Armani

quotes.quote: Think of me like a rainbow. Nice to look at, but always out of reach.
quotes.author: Keira Michelle Telford

quotes.quote: We cannot have real independence unless the people banish the touch-me-not spirit from their hearts.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Only parts of us will ever touch only parts of others.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: It's embarrassing sometimes, the way actors or musicians sometimes get made untouchable.
quotes.author: Cillian Murphy

quotes.quote: Glamour is an attitude, its the expression of a certain kind of confidence. A glamorous woman is always elegant, but she also possesses an air of mystery and excitement. Shes dramatic, almost untouchable.
quotes.author: Ralph Lauren

quotes.quote: Everyone says, 'oh, she has such perfect skin and her hands are so beautiful', as if I'm this kind of untouchable creature. But I have never thought of myself as this exquisite thing. I think of myself as a very approachable woman. But people used to think that when I said that I grew up on a farm it was this schtick, just me trying to say, 'look, I'm really a normal girl'.
quotes.author: Charlize Theron

quotes.quote: People could push and pull at you, and poke you, and probe as deep as they could go. They could even tear you apart, bit by bit. But at the heart and root and soul of you, something would remain untouched.
quotes.author: Lauren Oliver

quotes.quote: They did this to me but I have remained who I am. I am tempered. I am able. Inside myself there's an untouched man. If they came back now, and did everything to me again, they would never reach the untouched man. I've passed the exam I've been shirking all my life. I'm a graduate of pain.
quotes.author: John Le Carre

quotes.quote: The center of our being is a point of nothingness which is untouched by sin and by illusion, a point of pure truth.
quotes.author: Thomas Merton

quotes.quote: I learned that I could control my life. You are the master of your fate. . . you are the captain of your soul. I took control and went to my space. . . My space. . . the universal energy. . . I tapped into that space of divine flow, where all beings, all things are connected. That space is real. You cannot have a meaningful life without having spiritual self-reflection. Know who you are and why you are here. When you tap into that space, divine flow, that universal energy, you become untouchable in what you are called to do.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Part of me aches at the thought of her being so close yet so untouchable.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: True beauty is untouchable; you can only feel it.
quotes.author: Jesse Neo

quotes.quote: Unconditional love is cool, but I want untouchable love. The kind of love that can't be fucked with by others' opinions, lies, or influence. A love that is rooted in trust and strengthened by a sense of humor. Instead of getting upset, you simply laugh at dumb shit together.
quotes.author: The Captain

quotes.quote: I know I've got a death wish. I've never enjoyed my life, I've never liked people. I love the mountains because they are the negation of life, indestructible, inhuman, untouchable, indifferent, as I want to be.
quotes.author: Anna Kavan

quotes.quote: At the end of the day you gotta feel some way. So why not feel unbeatable? Why not feel untouchable.
quotes.author: Conor McGregor

quotes.quote: Happiness or sorrow- whatever befalls you, walk on untouched, unattached.
quotes.author: Gautama Buddha

quotes.quote: The soul who is most untouched is the most like to God.
quotes.author: Hadewijch

quotes.quote: We are not to be isolated but insulated, moving in the midst of evil but untouched by it.
quotes.author: Vance Havner

quotes.quote: To forge an untouchable, invulnerable identity is actually a sign of retreat from this world; of weakness, a sign of fear rather than strength, and betrays a strange misunderstanding of an abiding, foundational and necessary reality: that untouched, we disappear.
quotes.author: David Whyte

quotes.quote: It's not so unusual to run out of someone else's currency.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Sachs

quotes.quote: it not unusual for women with anorexia to suffer heart attacks.
quotes.author: Carre Otis

quotes.quote: To me, strange is just another way of saying unusual. And unusual is just another way of saying special.
quotes.author: Drew Hayden Taylor

quotes.quote: Comedy is unusual people in real situations; farce is real people in unusual situations.
quotes.author: Chuck Jones

quotes.quote: It's not unusual for socio-economic, even racial or ethnic, groups to cluster.
quotes.author: Jay Parini

quotes.quote: This is the unusual thing about nonviolence -- nobody is defeated, everybody shares in the victory.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: It is a mistake to think of creative activity as something unusual.
quotes.author: Jacob Bronowski

quotes.quote: If our solar system is not unusual, then there are so many planets in the universe that, for example, they outnumber the sum of all sounds and words ever uttered by every human who has ever lived. To declare that Earth must be the only planet with life in the universe would be inexcusably bigheaded of us.
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.quote: Being creative means first of all doing something unusual... On the other hand, however unusual it may be, the idea also has to be reasonable for people to take it seriously.
quotes.author: Howard Gardner

quotes.quote: Only in the most unusual cases is it useful to determine whether a book is good or bad; for it is just as rare for it to be one or the other. It is usually both.
quotes.author: Robert Musil

quotes.quote: If you are not willing to risk the unusual, you will have to settle for the ordinary.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: it is not unusual to hate great writers before we learn to love them. Because they have created something that did not yet exist, they must also create their audience. Sometimes the audience is not yet ready. Sometimes it has yet to be born.
quotes.author: Erica Jong

quotes.quote: This is a rather unusual situation in physics. We perform approximate calculations which are valid only in some regime and this gives us the exact answer. This is a theorist's heaven- exact results with approximate methods.
quotes.author: Nathan Seiberg

quotes.quote: It's an unusual opportunity, a chance for so many people to share in the excitement and the fun of the fact that we may be on to hints as to what the Universe is made out of. I guess the whole point of a prize like this is to be able to get that out into the community.
quotes.author: Saul Perlmutter

quotes.quote: We are not interested in the unusual, but in the usual seen unusually.
quotes.author: Beaumont Newhall

quotes.quote: Every new experience is unusual. The rest of life is just sleep and committee meetings.
quotes.author: John Twelve Hawks

quotes.quote: It's not any more unusual to be born twice than it is to be born once.
quotes.author: Ray Wylie Hubbard

quotes.quote: If the unusual never happened there would be no difference in people and then there wouldn't be any fun in life. The game would become merely a matter of addition and subtraction. It would make of us a race of bookkeepers with plodding minds. It's the guessing that develops a man's brain power.
quotes.author: Jesse Lauriston Livermore

quotes.quote: What is unusual about Earth is that language, literally, has become alive. It has infested matter. It is replicating and defining and building itself. And it is in us.
quotes.author: Terence McKenna

quotes.quote: Sorghum is kind of unusual. It can go to very high heats, but it's not as productive in most environments as maize is.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: Valuing unusual conduct is not as good as being careful about ordinary actions.
quotes.author: Zicheng Hong

quotes.quote: It requires a very unusual mind to undertake the analysis of the obvious.
quotes.author: Alfred North Whitehead

quotes.quote: Today is a most unusual day, because we have never lived it before; we will never live it again; it is the only day we have.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: There is unusual power in united prayer. God has planned for His people to join together in prayer, not only for Christian fellowship, spiritual nurture, and growth, but also for accomplishing His divine purposes and reaching His chosen goals.
quotes.author: Wesley L Duewel

quotes.quote: It's not unusual for kids in their twenties to be mad at their parents.
quotes.author: Joy Browne

quotes.quote: An unusual beginning must have an unusual end.
quotes.author: Mikhail Lermontov

quotes.quote: Avoid an unusual and unfamiliar word just as you would a reef.
quotes.author: Julius Caesar

quotes.quote: It is as pleasant as it is unusual to see thoroughly good people getting their deserts.
quotes.author: Charles Williams

quotes.quote: Everything in life is unusual until you become accustomed to it.
quotes.author: L. Frank Baum

quotes.quote: If this is the only planet on which not only life, but intelligent life, has arisen, that would be very unusual.
quotes.author: Seth Shostak

quotes.quote: Loneliness and the feeling of being unwanted is the most terrible poverty.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: The degree of freedom from unwanted thoughts and the degree of concentration on a single thought are the measures to gauge spiritual progress.
quotes.author: Ramana Maharshi

quotes.quote: We must not inflict life on children who will be resented; we must not inflict unwanted children on society.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.quote: There are unwanted emotions and pain that goes along with any birth.
quotes.author: John Travolta

quotes.quote: All men are sculptors, constantly chipping away the unwanted parts of their lives, trying to create their idea of a masterpiece.
quotes.author: Eddie Murphy

quotes.quote: Unwanted favours gain no gratitude.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: The greatest tragedy of old age is the tendency for the old to feel unneeded, unwanted, and of no use to anyone; the secret of happiness in the declining years is to remain interested in life, as active as possible, useful to others, busy, and forward looking.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: You build a wall to keep something unwanted out … or to hold something precious in.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: It's very hard, feeling that you're no more than a piece of unwanted furniture in this world.
quotes.author: Anton Chekhov

quotes.quote: The biggest disease today is not leprosy or tuberculosis, but rather the feeling of being unwanted.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Just as the unwanted pregnancy, there are unwanted people in your life you should strive to abort, and such abortion is not sin, nor harm, but the eradication of a destructive foetus.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: If you feel unwanted or unappreciated where you are or by those you're with, it only means you're in the wrong place or with the wrong people. Hang in there. Someone else will see you for the true gift you are.
quotes.author: LK Hunsaker

quotes.quote: I’ve found that falling asleep is the best way to politely excuse yourself from an unwanted interaction.
quotes.author: Babe Walker

quotes.quote: Let us touch the dying, the poor, the lonely and the unwanted according to the graces we have received and let us not be ashamed or slow to do the humble work.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Controlling unwanted thoughts is not the problem. Believing, thrusting, and taking direction from them is.
quotes.author: Charles F. Glassman

quotes.quote: Pushing away unwanted feelings and situations, equals inviting them to return back with a greater strength.
quotes.author: Raphael Zernoff

quotes.quote: Wisdom is unwanted in the colony of fools
quotes.author: Bamigboye Olurotimi

quotes.quote: I want to leave, to go somewhere where I should be really in my place, where I would fit in . . . but my place is nowhere; I am unwanted.
quotes.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quotes.quote: Contempt is the weapon of the weak and a defense against one's own despised and unwanted feelings.
quotes.author: Alice Miller

quotes.quote: Human beings have a tendency to push away unwanted pain, but my experience is that when I give my consent to it, it delivers its gift and moves on.
quotes.author: Michael Beckwith

quotes.quote: Do you know what an unwanted bodily condition is? It's a freshly hatched energy-summoning life-giving desire!
quotes.author: Esther Hicks

quotes.quote: To be lonely is to feel unwanted and unloved, and therefor unloveable. Loneliness is a taste of death. No wonder some people who are desperately lonely lose themselves in mental illness or violence to forget the inner pain.
quotes.author: Jean Vanier

quotes.quote: There are no unwanted children, just unfound families.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The truth is that there is almost nothing as tiresome as unwanted love.
quotes.author: Sheila Kohler

quotes.quote: No driven man hears unwanted counsel.
quotes.author: Janny Wurts

quotes.quote: Resistance to unwanted circumstances has the power to keep those circumstances alive and well for a very long time.
quotes.author: Pema Chodron

quotes.quote: In order to change unwanted habits and actions, it is important to take the time to get to know yourself.
quotes.author: Darren Johnson

quotes.quote: Nothing discourages unwanted questions as much as a flow of pious bleating.
quotes.author: George R. R. Martin

quotes.quote: It is impossible to enjoy idling thoroughly unless one has plenty of work to do.
quotes.author: Jerome K. Jerome

quotes.quote: Stress is sometimes just an excuse. You choose your own reactions to the world. Kick that excuse over and find smiling up at you the joy of choice and the choice of joy.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: You never know what makes some people tick until they begin to unwind.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: If people concentrated on the really important things in life, there'd be a shortage of fishing poles.
quotes.author: Doug Larson

quotes.quote: Give your stress wings and let it fly away.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: Work is not always required. There is such a thing as sacred idleness.
quotes.author: George Macdonald

quotes.quote: If a man insisted always on being serious, and never allowed himself a bit of fun or relaxation, he would go mad or become unstable without knowing it.
quotes.author: Herodotus

quotes.quote: Loafing needs no explanation and is its own excuse.
quotes.author: Christopher Morley

quotes.quote: Releasing the pressure, it's good for the teapot and the water. Try it sometime.
quotes.author: Jeb Dickerson

quotes.quote: The time to relax is when you don't have time for it.
quotes.author: Sydney J. Harris

quotes.quote: Taking time out each day to relax and renew is essential to living well.
quotes.author: Judith Hanson Lasater

quotes.quote: How body from spirit slowly does unwind, until we are pure spirit at the end.
quotes.author: Theodore Roethke

quotes.quote: Even the most powerful woman needs a place to unwind.
quotes.author: Barbara Taylor Bradford

quotes.quote: Sometimes the most important thing in a whole day is the rest we take between two deep breaths.
quotes.author: Etty Hillesum

quotes.quote: Fate will unwind as it must!
quotes.author: Burton Raffel

quotes.quote: It's hard to unwind protectionism.
quotes.author: Andrew Bernard

quotes.quote: Don’t underestimate the value of doing nothing, of just going along, listening to all the things you can’t hear, and not bothering.
quotes.author: A.A. Milne

quotes.quote: If you want to conquer the anxiety of life, live in the moment, live in the breath.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: Almost everything will work again if you unplug it for a few minutes…Including you.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.quote: It’s better to see something once than to hear about it a thousand times.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Tension is who you think you should be. Relaxation is who you are.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Calm mind brings inner strength and self-confidence, so that’s very important for good health.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Slow down and everything you are chasing will come around and catch you.
quotes.author: John De Paola

quotes.quote: For fast-acting relief, try slowing down.
quotes.author: Lily Tomlin

quotes.quote: You don’t always need a plan. Sometimes you just need to breathe, trust, let go and see what happens.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: Sometimes the most productive thing you can do is relax.
quotes.author: Mark Black

quotes.quote: Unwinds didn't go out with a bang-they didn't even go out with a whimper. they went out with the silence of a candle flame pinched between two fingers.
quotes.author: Neal Shusterman

quotes.quote: The moment you're loved, that's when you got your soul.
quotes.author: Neal Shusterman

quotes.quote: In a perfect world everything would be either black or white, right or wrong, and everyone would know the difference. But this isn't a perfect world. The problem is people who think it is.
quotes.author: Neal Shusterman

quotes.quote: One thing you learn when you've lived as long as I have-people aren't all good, and people aren't all bad. We move in and out of darkness and light all of our lives. Right now, I'm pleased to be in the light.
quotes.author: Neal Shusterman

quotes.quote: I've failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: Perpetual optimism is a force multiplier.
quotes.author: Colin Powell

quotes.quote: What the caterpillar calls the end of the world, the master calls a butterfly.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: All life is an experiment. The more experiments you make, the better.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: It doesn't matter how slow you go, as long as you don't stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: We must embrace pain and burn it as fuel for our journey.
quotes.author: Kenji Miyazawa

quotes.quote: Nobody can hurt me without my permission.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Defeat is simply a signal to press onward.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Positive thinking will let you do everything better than negative thinking will.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Pessimism leads to weakness, optimism to power.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Little minds are tamed and subdued by misfortune; but great minds rise above them.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: All bad things, like good things, must end.
quotes.author: Nihar Sharma

quotes.quote: Have great hopes and dare to go all out for them. Have great dreams and dare to live them. Have tremendous expectations and believe in them.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the airplane takes off against the wind, not with it.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote:
Clouds come floating into my life,
no longer to carry rain or usher storm,
but to add color to my sunset sky.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: Once you replace negative thoughts with positive ones, you'll start having positive results.
quotes.author: Willie Nelson

quotes.quote: Yesterday is not ours to recover, but tomorrow is ours to win or lose.
quotes.author: Lyndon B. Johnson

quotes.quote: You've got one life to live. Make this one count.
quotes.author: Kevin Ngo

quotes.quote: With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Believe deep down in your heart that you're destined to do great things.
quotes.author: Joe Paterno

quotes.quote: We must accept finite disappointment, but we must never lose infinite hope.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: A problem is a chance for you to do your best.
quotes.author: Duke Ellington

quotes.quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: The first step is you have to say that you can.
quotes.author: Will Smith

quotes.quote: Attitude is a little thing that makes a big difference.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Do not let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: The man who removes a mountain begins by carrying away small stones.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: The elevator to success is out of order. You'll have to use the stairs . . . one step at a time.
quotes.author: Joe Girard

quotes.quote: Tough times never last, but tough people do.
quotes.author: Robert H Schuller

quotes.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: You have to take all the ups and downs that come your way like a pinch of salt. Just leave everything behind. Forgive and forget.
quotes.author: Amruta Khanvilkar

quotes.quote: Everybody has their ups and downs, and that's what makes you tougher.
quotes.author: Isaac Hanson

quotes.quote: After certain ups and downs, a person does change, and I have changed for good.
quotes.author: Divyanka Tripathi

quotes.quote: You're going to have some ups and downs, so you have to prepare yourself to be ready. Those down moments come.
quotes.author: Pablo Sandoval

quotes.quote: There's no substitute for experiencing ups and downs - seeing how it's okay that things are overwhelming or broken sometimes and how companies recover from mistakes.
quotes.author: Joe Lonsdale

quotes.quote: You have ups and downs in any field, but the wait will always be worth it if you love your job.
quotes.author: Kiara Advani

quotes.quote: We all have ups and downs in our career, and as an actor going through a rough patch, all I can do is keep working as hard as I can and hope for the best.
quotes.author: Uday Kiran

quotes.quote: Once you find someone to share your ups and downs, downs are almost as good as ups.
quotes.author: Robert Breault

quotes.quote: I feel ups and downs are a part of one's career, and this totally depends on how you take it. You can either be knocked down by the negative things, or you can take it in a positive way and learn from it.
quotes.author: Deepika Padukone

quotes.quote: You have to accept the fact that sometimes you are the pigeon, and sometimes you are the statue.
quotes.author: Claude Chabrol

quotes.quote: Don't let ups and downs leave you down and out.
quotes.author: Harvey Mackay

quotes.quote: Surround yourself with good people who encourage and love you. There are always ups and downs, no matter how successful you are.
quotes.author: Liana Liberato

quotes.quote: It isn't the ups and downs that make life difficult; it's the jerks.
quotes.author: Charlie Chaplin

quotes.quote: The more ups and downs, the more joy I feel. The greater the fear, the greater the happiness I feel.
quotes.author: Jack Kerouac

quotes.quote: Whatever the ups and downs of detail within our limited experience, the larger whole is primarily beautiful.
quotes.author: Gregory Bateson

quotes.quote: If you can live with the ups and downs, pick yourself up every morning, then there's nothing more gratifying.
quotes.author: Rick Welts

quotes.quote: All the ups and downs are grace in different wrappings, sent to refine consciousness. Say thanks to them all.
quotes.author: Mooji

quotes.quote: Everyone goes through the ups and downs of living - fretting about the future, worrying about what happened. Music teaches us how to be in the moment.
quotes.author: David Sanborn

quotes.quote: There's going to be ups and downs and that you have to be okay with the downs too and embrace them just as much because they will teach you something.
quotes.author: Dan Mangan

quotes.quote: There's ups and downs of any job. If you worked at the post office, there's ups and downs. You have your good days, and you have your bad days. If you're a housewife, you have your good days, and you have your bad days.
quotes.author: Tracy Morgan

quotes.quote: You have to go through ups and downs. Mistakes turn into lessons.
quotes.author: D-Pryde

quotes.quote: There's ups and downs in this love. Got a lot to learn in this love. Through the good and the bad, still got love.
quotes.author: Beyonce

quotes.quote: We know we're going to go through ups and downs and we've all experienced that, but it's about surrendering some of that control, which we all find so hard to do, but it's really freeing when you can do that.
quotes.author: Mike Fisher

quotes.quote: The rise and fall of images of the future precedes or accompanies the rise and fall of cultures. As long as a society's image is positive and flourishing, the flower of culture is in full bloom. Once the image begins to decay and lose its vitality, however, the culture does not long survive
quotes.author: Fred Polak

quotes.quote: The rise or fall, success or failure of your dreams is largely dependent on the association you build yourself around.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: I've had my ups and downs. My fair share of bumpy roads and heavy winds. That's what made me what I am today.
quotes.author: Jean-Claude Van Damme

quotes.quote: Be grateful of your ups and downs. If you have none, then you're not alive.
quotes.author: Jesse Neo

quotes.quote: There are ups and downs, but whatever happens, you have to trust and believe in yourself.
quotes.author: Luka Modric

quotes.quote: In life, you have ups and downs, but you should never give up. You should always try to get ahead.
quotes.author: Yalitza Aparicio

quotes.quote: You will always have ups and downs in your life and your career, but just stay positive and go for it.
quotes.author: Angelique Kerber

quotes.quote: When you allow a person's words to upset you, you're giving away your power.
quotes.author: Phil Mcgraw

quotes.quote: To be upset over what you don't have is to waste what you do have.
quotes.author: Ken Keyes Jr.

quotes.quote: I am the cause of all my upsets. I am my worst enemy.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: Every time you get upset at something, ask yourself if you were to die tomorrow, was it worth wasting your time being angry?
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: People don't just get upset. They contribute to their upsetness.
quotes.author: Albert Ellis

quotes.quote: Don't allow yourself to be upset and disturbed. Hold your peace because without it you have no power.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: If you let cloudy water settle, it will become clear. If you let your upset mind settle, your course will also become clear.
quotes.author: Gautama Buddha

quotes.quote: That's the thing about someone who rarely gets upset: when they do, you notice.
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen

quotes.quote: I will never understand why people get so upset at things I don't even remember saying.
quotes.author: Tucker Max

quotes.quote: Why is it upset? Shouldn't it be downset?
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: Stop being so upset about the things you don't have that you forget to enjoy the things you already have.
quotes.author: Mercy Pheona

quotes.quote: People and things do not upset us. Rather, we upset ourselves by believing that they can upset us.
quotes.author: Albert Ellis

quotes.quote: You are never upset for the reason you think.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: You laugh it off, you get upset for a little while, you're human and you let it go.
quotes.author: Jennifer Lopez

quotes.quote: Don't waste your time being upset about something you can't change. Begin again and do it better this time.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: If you can do something about it, then why get upset? If you can't do anything about it, then why bother getting upset.
quotes.author: Lama Christie Mcnally

quotes.quote: Every sixty seconds you spend upset is a minute of happiness you'll never get back.
quotes.author: Andy Biersack

quotes.quote: When you allow what someone says or does to upset you, you're allowing them to control you.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: I don't let myself get upset about the little nitpicky things anymore.
quotes.author: Eric Shanteau

quotes.quote: I don't get upset over things I can control, because if I can control them there's no sense in getting upset. And I don't get upset over things I can't control, because if I can't control them there's no sense in getting upset.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: When someone is upset, it's not a good time to bring up your own problems.
quotes.author: Cynthia Lord

quotes.quote: Life happens. There is no point in being upset or down about things we can't control or change.
quotes.author: Amy Winehouse

quotes.quote: I'm no longer curious about things that will upset me.
quotes.author: Louise Hay

quotes.quote: When you're tempted to be upset, ask yourself 'Is this worth giving up my joy?
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: What ever makes you upset; leave it. What ever makes you smile; keep it.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: When we can find some humor in our upsets, they no longer seem as large or as important as they once did.
quotes.author: Allen Klein

quotes.quote: Don't get upset with people or situations. Both are powerless without your reaction.
quotes.author: Malika E Nura

quotes.quote: Know that no one is capable of making you upset without your consent.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Let's not allow ourselves to be upset by small things we should despise and forget. Remember "Life is too short to be little".
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: The more you know who you are, and what you want, the less you let things upset you.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Life is short. It can come and go like a feather in the wind
quotes.author: Shania Twain

quotes.quote: When my time on earth is gone, and my activities here are passed, I want they bury me upside down, and my critics can kiss my ass!
quotes.author: Bobby Knight

quotes.quote: Yes, you can lose somebody overnight, yes, your whole life can be turned upside down. Life is short. It can come and go like a feather in the wind.
quotes.author: Shania Twain

quotes.quote: The world is wrong side up. It needs to be turned upside down in order to be right side up.
quotes.author: Billy Sunday

quotes.quote: Turning popular opinion upside down does not make an original.
quotes.author: Franz Grillparzer

quotes.quote: The world is round and the place which may seem like the end may also be only the beginning.
quotes.author: Ivy Baker Priest

quotes.quote: I like to turn things upside down, to watch pictures and situations from another perspective.
quotes.author: Ursus Wehrli

quotes.quote: I'm always trying to turn things upside down and see if they look any better.
quotes.author: Tibor Kalman

quotes.quote: Look at everything upside down.Take absolutely nothing for granted.
quotes.author: Dick Francis

quotes.quote: It's a good thing to turn your mind upside down now and then, like an hour-glass, to let the particles run the other way.
quotes.author: Christopher Morley

quotes.quote: Some of us aren't meant to belong. Some of us have to turn the world upside down and shake the hell out of it until we make our own place in it.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Lowell

quotes.quote: Someday this upside-down world will be turned right side up, and nothing in all eternity will turn it back again. If we are wise, we will spend our brief lives on earth positioning ourselves for the turn.
quotes.author: Russ Crosson

quotes.quote: Learning about ourselves is rather inconvenient because it turns the world we live in upside down.
quotes.author: Peter Kingsley

quotes.quote: Our upside down welfare state is socialism for the rich, free enterprise for the poor.
quotes.author: William O. Douglas

quotes.quote: The truth of the matter is that the whole world has already been turned upside down by the work of Jesus Christ.
quotes.author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

quotes.quote: A Christianity without a passion to turn the world upside down is not reflective of apostolic Christianity.
quotes.author: Carl F. H. Henry

quotes.quote: Turning something upside-down elicits a reversal of content and pointing a steeple into the ground directs it to hell as opposed to heaven.
quotes.author: Dennis Oppenheim

quotes.quote: In seven days God had created the Earth. In a single day mankind had turned it upside down.
quotes.author: Kristina McMorris

quotes.quote: The world of the commodity is a world upside-down, which bases itself not upon life but upon the transformation of life into work.
quotes.author: Raoul Vaneigem

quotes.quote: All it takes is a second and your whole life can get turned upside down.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: Learn to see things backwards, inside out, and upside down.
quotes.author: John Heider

quotes.quote: Dull, inert cities, it is true, do contain the seeds of their own destruction and little else. But lively, diverse, intense cities contain the seeds of their own regeneration, with energy enough to carry over for problems and needs outside themselves.
quotes.author: Jane Jacobs

quotes.quote: A farm is an irregular patch of nettles bounded by short-term notes, containing a fool and his wife who didn't know enough to stay in the city.
quotes.author: S.J. Perelman

quotes.quote: Streets moderate the form and structure and comfort of urban communities.
quotes.author: Allan Jacobs

quotes.quote: I will Basquiat the canvas of your body like a Broadway Junction wall and Gordon Parks you for those dark midnights when your scent fades.
quotes.author: Brandi L. Bates

quotes.quote: Cities are places for people who can stand the heat of the kitchen.
quotes.author: Peter Hall

quotes.quote: America's last pioneers, urban nomads in search of wide open interior spaces.
quotes.author: Cathleen McGuigan

quotes.quote: In an urban environment, a church building is a thing of the past.
quotes.author: Mark Batterson

quotes.quote: A city that was to live by night after the wilderness had passed. A city that was to forge out of steel and blood red neon its own peculiar wilderness.
quotes.author: Nelson Algren

quotes.quote: He took me down and out into the afterlife of the brightly lit streets, a haze of rain around each streetlight like a galaxy, the whole street a universe spread out like a banquet.
quotes.author: Michael Montoure

quotes.quote: Urban legend has it that Area 51 is connected by underground tunnels and trains to other secret facilities around the country.
quotes.author: Annie Jacobsen

quotes.quote: The fact there is no route map to utopia does not mean that there are no routes to more accessible destinations.
quotes.author: Colin Ward

quotes.quote: Safer cities generally mean stronger urban economies.
quotes.author: Roger Altman

quotes.quote: But you're out of another world old kid. You ought to live on top of the Woolworth Building in an apartment made of cutglass and cherry blossoms.
quotes.author: John Dos Passos

quotes.quote: In an urban area, you're not going to be an hour away from another post office.
quotes.author: Blake Farenthold

quotes.quote: We need above all, I think, a certain remoteness from urban confusion.
quotes.author: Marjorie Kinnan Rawlings

quotes.quote: Poor air quality, which can be influenced by a variety of fumes, chemicals and allergens, is arguably the leading cause of triggers for most asthmatics in urban areas.
quotes.author: Ian Smith

quotes.quote: Urbanism is the most advanced, concrete fulfillment of a nightmare. Littre defines nightmare as 'a state that ends when one awakens with a start after extreme anxiety. But a start against whom? Who has stuffed us to the point of somnolence?
quotes.author: Tom McDonough

quotes.quote: Le Corbusier's dream city was like a wonderful mechanical toy. But as to how the city works, it tells nothing but lies.
quotes.author: Jane Jacobs

quotes.quote: You can't understand a city without using its public transportation system.
quotes.author: Erol Ozan

quotes.quote: Unlike the urban development that I see taking over and swallowing up our precious soil, when we interact with our environment in a way that allows for regeneration and natural spaces, the outcome can be beautiful.
quotes.author: Cory Trepanier

quotes.quote: Infrastructure deficit is an issue in all urban areas.
quotes.author: Sharad Pawar

quotes.quote: I have an urban background, but I need melody, I need a song, so I try to mix and match and keep it fluid.
quotes.author: Negash Ali

quotes.quote: Urban residents, most of them middle class, have a much better sense of their environmental rights, and they're willing to take to the streets.
quotes.author: Ma Jun

quotes.quote: To give everyone a house and garden is very difficult in urban areas.
quotes.author: Jeremy Corbyn

quotes.quote: In merging nature and culture the most successful cities combine such universal needs as maintaining or restoring contact with the cycles of nature, with specific, local characteristics.
quotes.author: Sally A. Kitt Chappell

quotes.quote: We make our buildings and afterwards they make us. They regulate the course of our lives.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Everyone's looking to the urban scene for inspiration now.
quotes.author: Robin Gibb

quotes.quote: A good city is like a good party. People don't want to leave early.
quotes.author: Jan Gehl

quotes.quote: Ultimately we need to recognize that while humans continue to build urban landscapes, we share these spaces with others species.
quotes.author: David Suzuki

quotes.quote: This is a pivotal time for urban regeneration. We must take a long term view.
quotes.author: Richard Rogers

quotes.quote: Everyone expects us to have a sense of urgency for life's big things. Life measures us by how we engage ourselves in the little things.
quotes.author: Bob Proctor

quotes.quote: You must take action now that will move you towards your goals. Develop a sense of urgency in your life.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.quote: Success requires both urgency and patience. Be urgent about making the effort, and patient about seeing the results.
quotes.author: Ralph Marston

quotes.quote: Urgency makes the difference between practitioners, proclaimers and procrastinators.
quotes.author: Richie Norton

quotes.quote: No other species flees from boredom with as much urgency as we do. We are far more eager to do brain work than we are to do physical labor.
quotes.author: Greg Carlson

quotes.quote: A higher rate of urgency does not imply ever-present panic, anxiety, or fear. It means a state in which complacency is virtually absent
quotes.author: John P. Kotter

quotes.quote: Move fast. A sense of urgency is the one thing you can develop that will separate you from everyone else. When you get a good idea, do it now.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Whatever your goal in life, unless you develop a great urgency, what could be near will be far away.
quotes.author: Jaggi Vasudev

quotes.quote: We ourselves are imbued with urgency, yet the message of our society is' that there is no viable alternative to the present.
quotes.author: Tom Hayden

quotes.quote: A life of fulfillment is one in which we put urgency in its place and remember that the ultimate target is to spend our lives doing the things we believe are most important to us.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: There must be a sense of urgency before anything can ever happen.
quotes.author: Andrew Crofts

quotes.quote: The urgency derives from the nearness of climate tipping points.
quotes.author: James Hansen

quotes.quote: We are now faced with the fact that tomorrow is today. We are confronted with the fierce urgency of now. In this unfolding conundrum of life and history, there "is" such a thing as being too late. This is no time for apathy or complacency. This is a time for vigorous and positive action.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: We have to live life with a sense of urgency, so not a minute is wasted.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: Urgency and vision are the twin pillars on which humanity's hope now hangs.
quotes.author: Christopher Flavin

quotes.quote: Urgency means paying the details the attention they deserve, with the respect they deserve, without delay.
quotes.author: Richie Norton

quotes.quote: Urgency fills our life with stress and anxiety. but slowness, simplicity, and love fill our life with beauty and happiness.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: There is one clear urgency in your life that you must never neglect, and that is â€” you must be yourself.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: You don't have as much time as you think you do. You got to operate like there's a sense of urgency!
quotes.author: Eric Thomas

quotes.quote: We cannot put off living until we are ready. The most salient characteristic of life is its urgency, 'here and now' without any possible postponement. Life is fired at us point-blank.
quotes.author: Jose Ortega Y Gasset

quotes.quote: Urgency is insecurity.
quotes.author: Michael Neill

quotes.quote: Life could snatch away the things you treasured, and there was no getting them back. She began to feel an urgency, a need to seize an opportunity. Before anyone else did.
quotes.author: M.L. Stedman

quotes.quote: Start from here, now is all you have, there will never be a better place or time and by tomorrow you would have lost more time.
quotes.author: Malti Bhojwani

quotes.quote: Urgency creates decision making.
quotes.author: Kevin Brady

quotes.quote: There's a sense of urgency in understanding that your body is not really your own. We can control it to a certain extent through habits and good behavior, but there's so much we don't have control of.
quotes.author: Sufjan Stevens

quotes.quote: Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Willing is not enough; we must do.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Time to improve is limited. The clock is always on and doesn't care if you don't feel like it. Someone else does and they're passing you by.
quotes.author: William James Moore

quotes.quote: Learn to let urgency go. Nothing is urgent. Stress is the product of uncertainty and urgency of life.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: When you love people, you give them a priority. You have a sense of urgency about their pain.
quotes.author: Cornel West

quotes.quote: Dream audaciously. Have the courage to fail forward. Act with urgency.
quotes.author: Phil Knight

quotes.quote: Look at the sky. We are not alone. The whole universe is friendly to us and conspires only to give the best to those who dream and work.
quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quotes.quote: The thinking that got us to where we are is not the thinking that will get us to where we want to be.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Let us remember that, as much has been given us, much will be expected from us, and that true homage comes from the heart as well as from the lips, and shows itself in deeds.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: What lies behind us and what lies ahead of us are tiny matters compared to what lives within us.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Let us develop respect for all living things. Let us try to replace violence and intolerance with understanding and compassion. And love.
quotes.author: Jane Goodall

quotes.quote: Let us be grateful to people who make us happy, they are the charming gardeners who make our souls blossom.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.quote: Whatever we are waiting for - peace of mind, contentment, grace, the inner awareness of simple abundance - it will surely come to us, but only when we are ready to receive it with an open and grateful heart.
quotes.author: Sarah Ban Breathnach

quotes.quote: Let us never know what old age is. Let us know the happiness time brings, not count the years.
quotes.author: Ausonius

quotes.quote: Each friend represents a world in us, a world not born until they arrive, and it is only by this meeting that a new world is born.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: Unconditional love really exists in each of us. It is part of our deep inner being. It is not so much an active emotion as a state of being. It's not 'I love you' for this or that reason, not 'I love you if you love me.' It's love for no reason, love without an object.
quotes.author: Ram Dass

quotes.quote: No matter what kind of challenges or difficulties or painful situations you go through in your life, we all have something deep within us that we can reach down and find the inner strength to get through them.
quotes.author: Alana Stewart

quotes.quote: Sometimes we may ask God for success, and He gives us physical and mental stamina. We might plead for prosperity, and we receive enlarged perspective and increased patience, or we petition for growth and are blessed with the gift of grace. He may bestow upon us conviction and confidence as we strive to achieve worthy goals.
quotes.author: David A. Bednar

quotes.quote: We always love those who admire us, but we do not always love those whom we admire.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Within all of us there is a storm. Some believe it will never end: but he who has faith in the heavens above will weather any storm.
quotes.author: R. Kelly

quotes.quote: Those who would judge us merely by the heights we have achieved would do well to remember the depths from which we started.
quotes.author: Kwame Nkrumah

quotes.quote: It's the beauty within us that makes it possible for us to recognize the beauty around us. The question is not what you look at but what you see.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Life is not easy for any of us. But what of that? We must have perseverance and above all confidence in ourselves. We must believe that we are gifted for something and that this thing must be attained.
quotes.author: Marie Curie

quotes.quote: Let us come alive to the splendor that is all around us and see the beauty in ordinary things.
quotes.author: Thomas Merton

quotes.quote: The environment is in us, not outside of us. The trees are our lungs, the rivers our bloodstream. We are all interconnected, and what you do to the environment ultimately you do to yourself.
quotes.author: Ian Somerhalder

quotes.quote: The reason so many of us are obsessed with becoming stars is because we are not yet starring in our own lives. The cosmic spotlight isn't pointed at you, it radiates from within you.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: Some journeys take us far from home. Some adventures lead us to our destiny.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Sometimes painful things can teach us lessons that we didn't think we needed to know.
quotes.author: Amy Poehler

quotes.quote: Let us never consider ourselves finished nurses....we must be learning all of our lives.
quotes.author: Florence Nightingale

quotes.quote: Be asÂ usefulÂ as a tree! Give life to others; be shelter to everyone; grant fruits to all! Be good like a tree!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: It'sÂ usefulÂ that there should be Gods, so let's believe there are.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: Sometimes the best way to beÂ usefulÂ is to get out of somebody's way.
quotes.author: Ashleigh Brilliant

quotes.quote: Being aÂ usefulÂ man has always seemed to me to be something truly hideous.
quotes.author: Charles Baudelaire

quotes.quote: Can anything that isÂ usefulÂ be accomplished without change?
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: The mostÂ usefulÂ truths are always universal, and unconnected with accidents and customs.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: The mostÂ usefulÂ thing about a principle is that it can always be sacrificed to expediency.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: To be constant is to beÂ useful. To beÂ usefulÂ is to realize one's true nature. Realization of one's true nature is happiness. When one reaches happiness, one is close to perfection.
quotes.author: Zhuang Zhou

quotes.quote: The mostÂ usefulÂ man in the mostÂ usefulÂ world, so long as only commodity was served, would remain unsatisfied. But, as fast as he sees beauty, life acquires a very high value.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: It's useful to think of the imagination as an aspect of the body because it seems to have processes of its own that are obscure to us.
quotes.author: Margo Lanagan

quotes.quote: The highest good and solelyÂ usefulÂ is liberal education.
quotes.author: Karl Wilhelm Friedrich Schlegel

quotes.quote: It's moreÂ usefulÂ to have someone fear you than respect you.
quotes.author: J. Cornell Michel

quotes.quote: It's a practical matter. If you're useful to others, you'll be hired.
quotes.author: Thomas Newman

quotes.quote: TheÂ usefulÂ may be trusted to further itself, for many produce it and no one can do without it; but the beautiful must be specially encouraged, for few can present it, while yet all have need of it.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: But that which isÂ usefulÂ is the better.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Only the rational andÂ usefulÂ is beautiful.
quotes.author: Yevgeny Zamyatin

quotes.quote: There is noÂ usefulÂ thing which may not be turned to an injurious purpose.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: Nothing is moreÂ usefulÂ to man that those arts which have no utility.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: It is alwaysÂ usefulÂ to think badly about people one has exploited or plans to exploit.
quotes.author: James W. Loewen

quotes.quote: It is sometimesÂ usefulÂ to pretend we are deceived, because when we show a deceiving man that we see through his artifices, we only encourage him to increase his deceptions.
quotes.author: Madeleine de Souvre

quotes.quote: One of the useful things about age is realizing conventional wisdom is often simply inertia with a candy coating of conformity.
quotes.author: Anna Quindlen

quotes.quote: The most useful thing about art is it's uselessness.
quotes.author: Tom Robbins

quotes.quote: Make yourselfÂ useful, not just on a day to day basis, but as a lifetime thing.
quotes.author: Julia Stiles

quotes.quote: 'Useful,' and 'necessity' was always 'the tyrant's plea'.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: When it isÂ usefulÂ to them, men can believe a theory of which they know nothing more than its name.
quotes.author: Vilfredo Pareto

quotes.quote: BeÂ usefulÂ where thou livest.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: Nothing is moreÂ usefulÂ than the useless.
quotes.author: Roger Scruton

quotes.quote: ItsÂ usefulÂ to go out of this world and see it from the perspective of another one.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: The mostÂ usefulÂ is the greatest.
quotes.author: Theodore Parker

quotes.quote: Take what'sÂ useful, discard what is not.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: What most people need to learn in life is how to love people and use things instead of using people and loving things.
quotes.author: Zelda Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: When you're nothing, people will ignore you but when you're on top that's when everybody swear they know you.
quotes.author: Lincey Alphonse

quotes.quote: Because I'm just a giving person spiritually, I feel that if your intentions are to use or abuse or take advantage of, then you might get what you get in the meantime, but there's still a price to pay.
quotes.author: Angie Stone

quotes.quote: Immature love says: 'I love you because I need you.' Mature love says: 'I need you because I love you
quotes.author: Erich Fromm

quotes.quote: I don't let people use me. That's why I like a small number of people in my life. The more people in my life, the more complex it becomes, so I just try to keep it at a minimum.
quotes.author: Anita Baker

quotes.quote: Not everyone will appreciate what you do for them. You have to figure out who's worth your kindness and who's just taking advantage.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: It's so funny how 'friends' forget us when they don't need any more favors.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Sometimes you try to help people, and it backfires on you, and then they try to take advantage of you.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: You are a manipulator. I like to think of myself more as an outcome engineer.
quotes.author: J.R. Ward,

quotes.quote: When you know what a man wants you know who he is, and how to move him.
quotes.author: George R.R. Martin

quotes.quote: All people have feelings, they are not there to be used. If you're not longer interested in someone, they have the right to be informed before you go and cheat or go looking elsewhere.
quotes.author: Jerry Springer

quotes.quote: I have learned that people at the bottom use others' bodies to climb to the top.
quotes.author: Mandla Langa

quotes.quote: Using people to leverage a refined process multiplies production, using people as a poor solution to a poor process multiplies problems.
quotes.author: Timothy Ferriss

quotes.quote: Men are used as they use others.
quotes.author: Bidpai

quotes.quote: Don't take advantage of each other, but fear God!
quotes.author: Leviticus 25:17

quotes.quote: Controllers, abusers, and manipulative people don't question themselves. They don't ask themselves if the problem is them. They always say the problem is someone else.
quotes.author: Darlene Ouimet

quotes.quote: Don't use men to get what you want in life. Get it yourself.
quotes.author: Helen Gurley Brown

quotes.quote: We have people who show love at our front and who hate at our back, but it's still hard to find that Mysterious person who love to walk with us without worrying what the destination will be.
quotes.author: Nishan Panwar

quotes.quote: Anytime you're taking advantage of other people financially, I think some sort of punishment is definitely correct.
quotes.author: Cliff Seigneur

quotes.quote: When success comes, people can try to trick you or take advantage of you.
quotes.author: Christina Aguilera

quotes.quote: Just because something isn't a lie does not mean that it isn't deceptive. A liar knows that he is a liar, but one who speaks mere portions of truth in order to deceive is a craftsman of destruction.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: I don't care if you hate me now, I already know you only treat me nice when you think I am useful to you.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: People try to constantly use me and I hate it.
quotes.author: Tracy Emin

quotes.quote: The measure of a man is what he does with power.
quotes.author: Greek Proverb

quotes.quote: Trickery and treachery are the practices of fools that have not the wits enough to be honest.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Strong people don't put others down they lift them up.
quotes.author: Michael P. Watson

quotes.quote: Is it possible to use people fairly?
quotes.author: Chris Boucher

quotes.quote: Is that what love is? Using people? And maybe that's what hate is - not being able to use people.
quotes.author: Tennessee Williams

quotes.quote: Why is it that the less use people have another human being, the politer they become to him? Relentlessly polite.
quotes.author: Alfred Hitchcock Presents

quotes.quote: People will naturally expect us to do something.
quotes.author: William M. Conselman

quotes.quote: All paradises, all utopias are designed by who is not there, by the people who are not allowed in.
quotes.author: Toni Morrison

quotes.quote: Utopia is that which is in contradiction with reality.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Utopia is a mixture of childish rationalism and secularized angelism.
quotes.author: Emile M. Cioran

quotes.quote: There is something very utopian about what I do. But utopia is nothing more than a truth that the world is not yet ready to hear.
quotes.author: Yann Arthus-Bertrand

quotes.quote: The idea of Utopia is mischievous as well as unrealistic. And dull, to boot. Man is born pushing and shoving as the sparks fly upward.
quotes.author: David Lilienthal

quotes.quote: Utopias are often just premature truths.
quotes.author: Alphonse De Lamartine

quotes.quote: Utopia would seem to offer the spectacle of one of those rare phenomena whose concept is indistinguishable from its reality, whose ontology coincides with its representation.
quotes.author: Fredric Jameson

quotes.quote: Utopias have their value—nothing so wonderfully expands the imaginative horizons of human potentialities—but as guides to conduct they can prove literally fatal.
quotes.author: Isaiah Berlin

quotes.quote: Some people consider utopia to be derived from nature. For some people, utopia is the city.
quotes.author: Joel Sternfeld

quotes.quote: The isolation, the separateness, is always a part of any utopia.
quotes.author: Toni Morrison

quotes.quote: To know oneself is to disbelieve utopia.
quotes.author: Michael Novak

quotes.quote: We must mistrust utopias: they usually end in holocausts.
quotes.author: Mario Vargas-Llosa

quotes.quote: Political utopias are a form of nostalgia for an imagined past projected onto the future as a wish.
quotes.author: Michael Ignatieff

quotes.quote: All the Utopias will come to pass only when we grow wings and all people are converted into angels.
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quotes.quote: All 'favorable' Utopias seem to be alike in postulating perfection while being unable to suggest happiness.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: Utopias rest on the fallacy that perfection is a legitimate goal of human existence.
quotes.author: Lewis Mumford

quotes.quote: For other nations, utopia is a blessed past never to be recovered; for Americans it is just beyond the horizon.
quotes.author: Henry A Kissinger

quotes.quote: People needed proof that Utopia was nothing more than a theory, an illusion read in fictional stories.
quotes.author: Soroosh Shahrivar

quotes.quote: Utopia never really is. And the perfection we seek will always disappoint.
quotes.author: Daniel Xiao Wang

quotes.quote: The ticket to Utopia ia real Love that springs from within us.
quotes.author: Katerina Kostaki

quotes.quote: An ideal world inhabited by carefree people is nothing more than a utopia.
quotes.author: Eraldo Banovac

quotes.quote: Capitalism is always evaluated against dreams. Utopia is a dream. It doesn't exist.
quotes.author: Rush Limbaugh

quotes.quote: The fact there is no route-map to utopia does not mean that there are no routes to more accessible destinations.
quotes.author: Colin Ward

quotes.quote: Utopia is in the moment. Not in some future time, some other place, but in the here and now, or else it is nowhere.
quotes.author: Alfred Stieglitz

quotes.quote: Utopias now appear much more realizable than one used to think. We are now faced with a different new worry: How to prevent their realization.
quotes.author: Nikolai Berdyaev

quotes.quote: Utopia is the process of making a better world, the name for one path history can take, a dynamic, tumultuous, agonizing process, with no end. Struggle forever.
quotes.author: Kim Stanley Robinson

quotes.quote: Perhaps the greatest utopia would be if we could all realize that no utopia is possible; no place to run, no place to hide, just take care of business here and now.
quotes.author: Jack Carroll

quotes.quote: Utopia is the impossible, not rendered possible, but shown as necessary.
quotes.author: Jean-Luc Nancy

quotes.quote: Idealists and reformers all become executioners in their turn. The road to utopia ends with the steps of the scaffold, the endless moment of the guillotine.
quotes.author: Grant Morrison

quotes.quote: When you make a company, you make a utopia. It's where you design your perfect world.
quotes.author: Derek Sivers
